14281240Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal abstract class ClassA<TDerived> : ClassADi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const Int32 MaximumNumberConcurrentThreads = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Semaphore semaphore = new Semaphore(ClassA<TDerived>.MaximumNumberConcurrentThreads, ClassA<TDerived>.MaximumNumberConcurrentThreads);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal void MethodA()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (ClassA.setCurrentlyExcutingTypeLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!((ClassA.currentlyExcutingType == null) || (ClassA.currentlyExcutingType == typeof(TDerived))))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Monitor.Wait(ClassA.setCurrentlyExcutingTypeLock);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ClassA.currentlyExcutingType == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ClassA.currentlyExcutingType = typeof(TDerived);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ClassA.numberCurrentlyPossiblyExecutingThreads++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Monitor.PulseAll(ClassA.setCurrentlyExcutingTypeLock);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ClassA<TDerived>.semaphore.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.MethodACore();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ClassA<TDerived>.semaphore.Release();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        lock (ClassA.setCurrentlyExcutingTypeLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ClassA.numberCurrentlyPossiblyExecutingThreads--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ClassA.numberCurrentlyPossiblyExecutingThreads == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ClassA.currentlyExcutingType = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 14283282Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MultiKeyDictionary<T1, T2, T3>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T1, Tuple<T1, T2, T3>> firstLookup = new Dictionary<T1, Tuple<T1, T2, T3>>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T2, Tuple<T1, T2, T3>> secondLookup = new Dictionary<T2, Tuple<T1, T2, T3>>();Di2015NewLine    private Dictionary<T3, Tuple<T1, T2, T3>> thirdLookup = new Dictionary<T3, Tuple<T1, T2, T3>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(Tuple<T1, T2, T3> values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!firstLookup.ContainsKey(values.Item1) &&Di2015NewLine            !secondLookup.ContainsKey(values.Item2) &&Di2015NewLine            !thirdLookup.ContainsKey(values.Item3))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            firstLookup.Add(values.Item1, values);Di2015NewLine            secondLookup.Add(values.Item2, values);Di2015NewLine            thirdLookup.Add(values.Item3, values);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //throw an exeption or something.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tuple<T1, T2, T3> GetFirst(T1 key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return firstLookup[key];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tuple<T1, T2, T3> GetSecond(T2 key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return secondLookup[key];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Tuple<T1, T2, T3> GetThird(T3 key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return thirdLookup[key];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RemoveFirst(T1 key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = GetFirst(key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        firstLookup.Remove(values.Item1);Di2015NewLine        secondLookup.Remove(values.Item2);Di2015NewLine        thirdLookup.Remove(values.Item3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public secondLookup.Remove(values.Item2);Di2015NewLine        thirdLookup.Remove(values.Item3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RemoveThird(T3 key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine 14287210Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void SetImageCoordinate(double x, double y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TransformGroup transformGroup = (TransformGroup)image.RenderTransform;Di2015NewLine        ScaleTransform transform = (ScaleTransform)transformGroup.Children[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ImageSource imageSource = image.Source;Di2015NewLine        BitmapImage bitmapImage = (BitmapImage) imageSource ;Di2015NewLine        //Now since you got the image displayed in Image control. 14291338Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction decode(str) {Di2015NewLine  var keyStr = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";Di2015NewLine  var output = "";Di2015NewLine  var chr1, chr2, chr3;Di2015NewLine  var enc1, enc2, enc3, enc4;Di2015NewLine  var i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  do {Di2015NewLine     enc1 = keyStr.indexOf(str.charAt(i++));Di2015NewLine     enc2 = keyStr.indexOf(str.charAt(i++));Di2015NewLine     enc3 = keyStr.indexOf(str.charAt(i++));Di2015NewLine     enc4 = keyStr.indexOf(str.charAt(i++));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     chr1 = (enc1 << 2) | (enc2 >> 4);Di2015NewLine     chr2 = ((enc2 & 15) << 4) | (enc3 >> 2);Di2015NewLine     chr3 = ((enc3 & 3) << 6) | enc4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     output = output + String.fromCharCode(chr1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     if (enc3 != 64) {Di2015NewLine        output = output + String.fromCharCode(chr2);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     if (enc4 != 64) {Di2015NewLine        output = output + String.fromCharCode(chr3);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine   } while (i < str.length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14291751Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnReceive(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Socket clientSocket = (Socket)result.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        clientSocket.EndReceive(result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        command = responseMessage = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        command = ByteToString(receviedData);Di2015NewLine        receviedData = new byte[30];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (command=="Connect")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ClientInfo clientInfo = new ClientInfo() {Di2015NewLine               socket = clientSocket,Di2015NewLine               IP = clientSocket.RemoteEndPoint.ToString(),Di2015NewLine               }; i < connectedClients.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (connectedClients[i].socket==clientSocket)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                connectedClients[i].socket.BeginSend(responseStatus, 0, responseStatus.Length,SocketFlags.None, new AsyncCallback(OnSend), connectedClients[i].socket);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // add error handling and gracefully recoverDi2015NewLine      // caution: The way done here, might work, but it smells :-/Di2015NewLine      removeClientInfo((Socket)result.AsyncState);Di2015NewLine      ((Socket)result.AsyncState).Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// removes the client info from the connectedClients enumerableDi2015NewLineprivate void removeClientInfo(Socket socket)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; 14291822Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Queue<Action> queue = new Queue<Action>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // put three things in the queue. Di2015NewLine        // In a simple world, they would finish in order.Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(() => DoWork(1));Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(() => DoComplicatedWork(2));Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(() => DoWork(3));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PumpMessages();            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void PumpMessages()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Action action = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DoWork(int i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Doing work: {0}", i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void DoComplicatedWork(int i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Before doing complicated work: {0}", i);Di2015NewLine        PumpMessages();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("After doing complicated work: {0}", i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}`Di2015NewLine

14292083Di2015UniqueSeparator// Updates all child tree nodes recursively. Di2015NewLineprivate void CheckAllChildNodes(TreeNode treeNode, bool nodeChecked)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   foreach(TreeNode node in treeNode.Nodes)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      node.Checked = nodeChecked;Di2015NewLine      if(node.Nodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // If the current node has child nodes, call the CheckAllChildsNodes method recursively. Di2015NewLine         this.CheckAllChildNodes(node, nodeChecked);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// NOTE   This code can be added to the BeforeCheck event handler instead of the AfterCheck event. Di2015NewLine// After a tree node's Checked property is changed, all its child nodes are updated to the same value. Di2015NewLineprivate void node_AfterCheck(object sender, TreeViewEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   // The code only executes if the user caused the checked state to change. Di2015NewLine   if(e.Action != TreeViewAction.Unknown)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if(e.Node.Nodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         /* Calls the CheckAllChildNodes method, passing in the current Di2015NewLine         Checked value of the TreeNode whose checked state changed. */ Di2015NewLine         this.CheckAllChildNodes(e.Node, e.Node.Checked);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14293976Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<Student, object> BuildPredicate(string propertyName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type studentType = typeof(Student);Di2015NewLine    ParameterExpression studentParam = Expression.Parameter(studentType, "x");Di2015NewLine    MemberInfo ageProperty = studentType.GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine    MemberExpression valueInNameProperty = Expression.MakeMemberAccess(studentParam, ageProperty);Di2015NewLine    UnaryExpression expression = Expression.Convert(valueInNameProperty, typeof (object));Di2015NewLine    Expression<Func<Student, object>> orderByExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<Student, object>>(expression, studentParam);Di2015NewLine    return orderByExpression.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14293976Di2015UniqueSeparatorType studentType = typeof (Student);Di2015NewLinevar properties = studentType.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                            .Select(x => new { Property = x, OrderAttribute = x.GetCustomAttribute<UseInOrderByAttribute>() })Di2015NewLine                            .Where(x => x.OrderAttribute != null)Di2015NewLine                            .OrderBy(x => x.OrderAttribute.Order);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar orderByProperty = properties.FirstOrDefault(x => x.OrderAttribute.Order == 0);Di2015NewLineif (orderByProperty  == null)Di2015NewLine    throw new Exception("");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar sortedStudents = students.OrderBy(BuildPredicate(orderByProperty.Property.Name));Di2015NewLineforeach (var property in properties.Where(x => x.Property.Name != orderByProperty.Property.Name))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    sortedStudents = sortedStudents.ThenBy(BuildPredicate(property.Property.Name));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar result = sortedStudents.ToList();Di2015NewLine

14297517Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct ItemInformationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public readonly int ItemNumber;Di2015NewLine  public readonly double HighPrice, LowPrice;  // no MedianPrice hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public ItemInformation(int number, double highP, double lowP) // no need to chain this()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.ItemNumber = number;Di2015NewLine    this.HighPrice = highP;Di2015NewLine    this.LowPrice = lowP;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public double MedianPriceDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      return 0.5 * (HighPrice + LowPrice);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Subject<Thing> BufferedAdds {get; private set;}Di2015NewLinepublic Subject<Thing> BufferedChanges {get; private set;}Di2015NewLinepublic Subject<Thing> BufferedRemoves {get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine_adds = Observable.FromEvent<EventDelegateAdd, Thing>(Di2015NewLine    ev => new EventDelegateAdd(ev),Di2015NewLine    h => mSource.AddingThing += h,Di2015NewLine    h => mSource.AddingThing -= h);Di2015NewLineBufferedAdds = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine_changes = Observable.FromEvent<EventDelegateChange, Thing>(Di2015NewLine    ev => new EventDelegateChange(ev),Di2015NewLine    h => mSource.ChangingThing += h,Di2015NewLine    h => mSource.ChangingThing -= h);Di2015NewLineBufferedChanges = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine_removes = Observable.FromEvent<EventDelegateRemove, Thing>(Di2015NewLine    ev => new EventDelegateRemove(ev),Di2015NewLine    h => mSource.RemovingThing += h,Di2015NewLine    h => mSource.RemovingThing -= h);Di2015NewLineBufferedRemoves = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLine

14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic MyEventCachingBridge(Di2015NewLine    MyCustomDataSource source, Di2015NewLine    int eventRelayInterval, Di2015NewLine    IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorBuffer
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparator_buffer = Observable.Merge(scheduler,Di2015NewLine        _adds.Select(e => Tuple.Create(e, ThingEventType.Add)), Di2015NewLine        _changes.Select(e => Tuple.Create(e, ThingEventType.Change)), Di2015NewLine        _removes.Select(e => Tuple.Create(e, ThingEventType.Remove)))Di2015NewLine    .Buffer(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(eventRelayInterval), scheduler);Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate enum ThingEventTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Add,Di2015NewLine    Change,Di2015NewLine    RemoveDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorList
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Queue<IList<Tuple<Thing,ThingEventType>>> _eventQueue;Di2015NewLineprivate static object SyncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine_eventQueue = new Queue<IList<Tuple<Thing,ThingEventType>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A serial disposable is a sort of "Disposable holder" - when you change it'sDi2015NewLine// Disposable member, it auto-disposes what you originally had there...no realDi2015NewLine// need for it here, but potentially useful laterDi2015NewLine_watcherDisposable = new SerialDisposable();Di2015NewLine_watcherDisposable.Disposable = _bufferDi2015NewLine    .ObserveOn(_scheduler)Di2015NewLine    .Subscribe(batch => Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        lock(SyncRoot) { _eventQueue.Enqueue(batch); }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine    _disposables.Add(_watcherDisposable);Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatoreventRelayInterval
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar pulse = Observable.Interval(Di2015NewLine       TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(eventRelayInterval), Di2015NewLine       _scheduler);Di2015NewLine_disposables.Add(pulseDi2015NewLine      .ObserveOn(_scheduler)Di2015NewLine      .Subscribe(x => PlayBackCachedEvents()));Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyEventCachingBridge : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CompositeDisposable _disposables;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _disposables.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void PlayBackCachedEvents()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    BulkChangesStart();   // Raise Event to notify GUI to suspend screen updatesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Play back the list of events to push changes Di2015NewLine    lock(SyncRoot)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach(var batch in _eventQueue)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Play back the list of events to push changes to ListView, TreeView, graphs, etc...            Di2015NewLine            foreach(var evt in batch)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch(evt.Item2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case ThingEventType.Add: BufferedAdds.OnNext(evt.Item1); break;Di2015NewLine                    case ThingEventType.Change: BufferedChanges.OnNext(evt.Item1);break;Di2015NewLine                    case ThingEventType.Remove: BufferedRemoves.OnNext(evt.Item1);break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _eventQueue.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    BulkChangesEnd();   // Raise Event to notify GUI to allow control refreshDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BridgeConsumer : Window, IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly CompositeDisposable _disposables;Di2015NewLine    private IScheduler _scheduler;Di2015NewLine    private StackPanel _panel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnLoaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs ea)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _panel = new StackPanel();Di2015NewLine        this.Content = _panel;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BridgeConsumer(MyEventCachingBridge bridge, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // for cleanup of any subscriptionsDi2015NewLine        _disposables = new CompositeDisposable();Di2015NewLine        _disposables.Add(bridge);Di2015NewLine        _scheduler = scheduler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Loaded += OnLoaded;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // setup a listener for the bulk start/end events on the bridgeDi2015NewLine        var bulkStart = Observable.FromEvent(Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesStart += new EventDelegateBulkChangesStart(h),Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesStart -= new EventDelegateBulkChangesStart(h));Di2015NewLine        var bulkEnd = Observable.FromEvent(Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesEnd += new EventDelegateBulkChangesEnd(h),Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesEnd -= new EventDelegateBulkChangesEnd(h));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the "meaty bit" - Di2015NewLine        //    1. create a "window" defined by bulk start/end eventsDi2015NewLine        //    2. inside that "window", trap any occurrences on a Di2015NewLine        //          merged view of adds/changes/removesDi2015NewLine        //    3. foreach event in that window, select that eventDi2015NewLine        //         (i.e., give us window contents as a stream of sorts)Di2015NewLine        var bridgeWatcher =Di2015NewLine            from thingEventWindow in Di2015NewLine                Observable.Merge(Di2015NewLine                    bridge.BufferedAdds.Select(t => Tuple.Create("add", t)), Di2015NewLine                    bridge.BufferedChanges.Select(t => Tuple.Create("change", t)), Di2015NewLine                    bridge.BufferedRemoves.Select(t => Tuple.Create("remove", t))Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine                .Window(bulkStart, start => bulkEnd)Di2015NewLine            from thingEvent in thingEventWindowDi2015NewLine            select thingEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // this could just as easily be a method, a bound call to the viewmodel, etcDi2015NewLine        Action<Thing, string, DateTimeOffset> addToList = (thing, msg, ts) => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var text = new TextBlock() Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                Text = string.Format(Di2015NewLine                    "At:{0} Key:{2} Msg:{3} - nowTime = {1}", Di2015NewLine                    thing.TimeStamp, Di2015NewLine                    ts, Di2015NewLine                    thing.Key, Di2015NewLine                    msg) };Di2015NewLine            _panel.Children.Add(text);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _disposables.Add(bridgeWatcherDi2015NewLine            // CAREFUL! "ObserveOn" means what you'd think "SubscribeOn" wouldDi2015NewLine            .ObserveOnDispatcher()Di2015NewLine            .Subscribe(tup => Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addToList(tup.Item2, tup.Item1, _scheduler.Now);Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // clean upDi2015NewLine        if(_disposables != null) _disposables.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14297693Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var scheduler = Scheduler.Default;Di2015NewLine    var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    var canceller = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var source = new MyCustomDataSource();    Di2015NewLine    var eventRelayInterval = 2000;Di2015NewLine    var bridge = new MyEventCachingBridge(source, eventRelayInterval, scheduler);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var window = new BridgeConsumer(bridge);Di2015NewLine    window.Closed += (o,e) => { canceller.Cancel(); window.Dispose(); };Di2015NewLine    window.Show();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine        () => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while(true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var thing = new Thing() Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    Key = "added thing " + rnd.Next(0, 100), Di2015NewLine                    Title = "title for added thing", Di2015NewLine                    TimeStamp = scheduler.Now.DateTime Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                source.FireAdd(thing);Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(rnd.Next(1,10) * 100);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }, canceller.Token);            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BridgeConsumer : Window, IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly CompositeDisposable _disposables;Di2015NewLine    private StackPanel _panel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void OnLoaded(object sender, RoutedEventArgs ea)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _panel = new StackPanel();Di2015NewLine        this.Content = _panel;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BridgeConsumer(MyEventCachingBridge bridge)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _disposables = new CompositeDisposable();Di2015NewLine        _disposables.Add(bridge);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Loaded += OnLoaded;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var bulkStart = Observable.FromEvent(Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesStart += new EventDelegateBulkChangesStart(h),Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesStart -= new EventDelegateBulkChangesStart(h));Di2015NewLine        var bulkEnd = Observable.FromEvent(Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesEnd += new EventDelegateBulkChangesEnd(h),Di2015NewLine                h => bridge.BulkChangesEnd -= new EventDelegateBulkChangesEnd(h));Di2015NewLine        var bridgeWatcher =Di2015NewLine            from thingEventWindow in Di2015NewLine                Observable.Merge(Di2015NewLine                    bridge.BufferedAdds.Select(t => Tuple.Create("add", t)), Di2015NewLine                    bridge.BufferedChanges.Select(t => Tuple.Create("change", t)), Di2015NewLine                    bridge.BufferedRemoves.Select(t => Tuple.Create("remove", t))Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine                .Window(bulkStart, start => bulkEnd)Di2015NewLine            from thingEvent in thingEventWindowDi2015NewLine            select thingEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Thing, string> addToList = (thing, msg) => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var text = new TextBlock() Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                Text = string.Format(Di2015NewLine                    "At:{0} Key:{1} Msg:{2}", Di2015NewLine                    thing.TimeStamp, Di2015NewLine                    thing.Key, Di2015NewLine                    msg) Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            _panel.Children.Add(text);Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _disposables.Add(bridgeWatcher.ObserveOnDispatcher().Subscribe(tup => Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                addToList(tup.Item2, tup.Item1);Di2015NewLine            }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(_disposables != null) _disposables.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void EventDelegateAdd(Thing thing);Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void EventDelegateChange(Thing thing);Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void EventDelegateRemove(Thing thing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void EventDelegateBulkChangesStart();Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void EventDelegateBulkChangesEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The "Things" that are stored in MyCustomDataSourceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ThingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DateTime TimeStamp {get; set;}Di2015NewLine    public string Key { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public object OtherStuff { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("At:{0} Key:{1} Title:{2}", this.TimeStamp, this.Key, this.Title);        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// A custom observable data source with events that indicate when Things areDi2015NewLine// added, changed, or removed.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyCustomDataSourceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public event EventDelegateAdd AddingThing = delegate { };Di2015NewLine    public event EventDelegateChange ChangingThing = delegate { };Di2015NewLine    public event EventDelegateRemove RemovingThing = delegate { };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The rest of the class that manages the database of Things...Di2015NewLine    public void FireAdd(Thing toAdd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AddingThing(toAdd);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void FireChange(Thing toChange)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ChangingThing(toChange);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public void FireRemove(Thing toRemove)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        RemovingThing(toRemove);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This class forms a configurable event bridge between the MyCustomDataSource andDi2015NewLine// the GUI.  The goal is to cache, filter, and throttle the events so that the GUIDi2015NewLine// updates only occasionally with bulk changes that are relevant for that control.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MyEventCachingBridge : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private enum ThingEventTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Add,Di2015NewLine        Change,Di2015NewLine        RemoveDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MyCustomDataSource mSource;Di2015NewLine    private IScheduler _scheduler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventDelegateBulkChangesStart BulkChangesStart = delegate { };Di2015NewLine    public event EventDelegateBulkChangesEnd BulkChangesEnd = delegate { };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IObservable<Thing> RawAdds {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine    public IObservable<Thing> RawChanges {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine    public IObservable<Thing> RawRemoves {get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Subject<Thing> BufferedAdds {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine    public Subject<Thing> BufferedChanges {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine    public Subject<Thing> BufferedRemoves {get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly IObservable<IList<Tuple<Thing,ThingEventType>>> _buffer;Di2015NewLine    private List<IList<Tuple<Thing,ThingEventType>>> _eventQueue;Di2015NewLine    private static object SyncRoot = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly CompositeDisposable _disposables;Di2015NewLine    private readonly SerialDisposable _watcherDisposable;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyEventCachingBridge(MyCustomDataSource source, int eventRelayInterval, IScheduler scheduler)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _disposables = new CompositeDisposable();Di2015NewLine        mSource = source;Di2015NewLine        _scheduler = scheduler;Di2015NewLine        _eventQueue = new List<IList<Tuple<Thing,ThingEventType>>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Magical Reactive Extensions code goes here that subscribes to all 3 events...Di2015NewLine        //Di2015NewLine        //   mSource.AddingThingDi2015NewLine        //   mSource.ChangingThingDi2015NewLine        //   mSource.RemovingThingDi2015NewLine        // Di2015NewLine        //  ...filters and records a list of the events as they are received ( maintaining order of events too ),Di2015NewLine        //  then every eventRelayInterval milliseconds, plays back the events in bulk to update the GUI Di2015NewLine        //  ( on the GUIs thread ).  Note that LINQ will be used to filter the Things so that a subset ofDi2015NewLine        //  Thing changes are relayed to the GUI - i.e. - not all Thing events are observed by the GUI.Di2015NewLine        RawAdds = Observable.FromEvent<EventDelegateAdd, Thing>(Di2015NewLine            ev => new EventDelegateAdd(ev),Di2015NewLine            h => mSource.AddingThing += h,Di2015NewLine            h => mSource.AddingThing -= h);Di2015NewLine        BufferedAdds = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RawChanges = Observable.FromEvent<EventDelegateChange, Thing>(Di2015NewLine            ev => new EventDelegateChange(ev),Di2015NewLine            h => mSource.ChangingThing += h,Di2015NewLine            h => mSource.ChangingThing -= h);Di2015NewLine        BufferedChanges = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        RawRemoves = Observable.FromEvent<EventDelegateRemove, Thing>(Di2015NewLine            ev => new EventDelegateRemove(ev),Di2015NewLine            h => mSource.RemovingThing += h,Di2015NewLine            h => mSource.RemovingThing -= h);Di2015NewLine        BufferedRemoves = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _buffer = Observable.Merge(Di2015NewLine                    _scheduler,Di2015NewLine                    RawAdds.Select(e => Tuple.Create(e, ThingEventType.Add)), Di2015NewLine                    RawChanges.Select(e => Tuple.Create(e, ThingEventType.Change)), Di2015NewLine                    RawRemoves.Select(e => Tuple.Create(e, ThingEventType.Remove)))Di2015NewLine            .Buffer(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(eventRelayInterval), _scheduler);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _watcherDisposable = new SerialDisposable();Di2015NewLine        _watcherDisposable.Disposable = _bufferDi2015NewLine            .ObserveOn(_scheduler)Di2015NewLine            .Subscribe(batch => Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                lock(SyncRoot) { _eventQueue.Add(batch); }Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        _disposables.Add(_watcherDisposable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var pulse = Observable.Interval(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(eventRelayInterval), _scheduler);Di2015NewLine        _disposables.Add(pulse.ObserveOn(_scheduler).Subscribe(x => PlayBackCachedEvents()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void PlayBackCachedEvents()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BulkChangesStart();   // Raise Event to notify GUI to suspend screen updatesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {            Di2015NewLine            //_eventQueue.Dump();Di2015NewLine            lock(SyncRoot)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach(var batch in _eventQueue)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Play back the list of events to push changes to ListView, TreeView, graphs, etc...            Di2015NewLine                    foreach(var evt in batch)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        switch(evt.Item2)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            case ThingEventType.Add: BufferedAdds.OnNext(evt.Item1); break;Di2015NewLine                            case ThingEventType.Change: BufferedChanges.OnNext(evt.Item1);break;Di2015NewLine                            case ThingEventType.Remove: BufferedRemoves.OnNext(evt.Item1);break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                _eventQueue.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Exception during playback:" + ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        BulkChangesEnd();   // Raise Event to notify GUI to allow control refreshDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _disposables.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14297869Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<List<string>> eList = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLineeList.Add(new List<string>() { "a", "b" });Di2015NewLineeList.Add(new List<string>() { "a", "c" });Di2015NewLineeList.Add(new List<string>() { "a", "b" });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar mergedList = eList.Distinct(new ListComparer()).ToList();Di2015NewLine
14297869Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ListComparer : IEqualityComparer<List<string>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(List<string> x, List<string> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return x.SequenceEqual(y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(List<string> obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return obj.Take(5).Aggregate(23,(sum,s)=> sum ^= s.GetHashCode());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14297869Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<List<string>> eList = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLineeList.Add(new List<string>() { "a", "b" }); <--Di2015NewLineeList.Add(new List<string>() { "a", "c" });Di2015NewLineeList.Add(new List<string>() { "b", "a" }); <--Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar mergedList = eList.Select(x => new HashSet<string>(x))Di2015NewLine                      .Distinct(HashSet<string>.CreateSetComparer()).ToList();Di2015NewLine

14298513Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar memberQuery = from m in db.MembersDi2015NewLine                  where m.MemberID == textBox1.TextDi2015NewLine                     // ^ you need to reference the MemberID by the queryDi2015NewLine                     //   variable (m) not the class name (Member).Di2015NewLine                  select m;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar member = memberQuery.SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLine                      // ^ when you only expect zero or one records from theDi2015NewLine                      //   database, use SingleOrDefault instead ofDi2015NewLine                      //   FirstOrDefault, because it will throw an exceptionDi2015NewLine                      //   when more than one record is returned.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (member != null)Di2015NewLine // ^ always check to make sure that the database returned a value before tryingDi2015NewLine //   to access any fields on the object.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string currentId = member.MemberID;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // a member with the given ID doesn't exist in the databaseDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14298963Di2015UniqueSeparatorcenterScreen
14298963Di2015UniqueSeparatorcursor_v2
14298963Di2015UniqueSeparatorTexture2D gradline; // set this var to your fading line texture in LoadContent Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineVector2 centerScreen = new Vector2(Di2015NewLine  GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Width, GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Height);Di2015NewLineVector2 cursor_v2 = new Vector2(currentMouseState.X, currentMouseState.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinespriteBatch.Draw(           // this is one of many Draw overloadsDi2015NewLine  gradline,                // your line textureDi2015NewLine  centerScreen,           // we just set this to be at your game window centerDi2015NewLine  null,                  // this means entire texture will be drawnDi2015NewLine  Color.White,                        // no tintingDi2015NewLine  GetAngle(centerScreen, cursor_v2), // this rotates texture, see my code belowDi2015NewLine  Vector2.Zero,      // texture will be drawn from screen center without offsetDi2015NewLine  new Vector2(GetDistance(centerScreen, cursor_v2) / gradline.Width, 1),Di2015NewLine    // ↑ This is scaling vector, X scales texture to distance from screen centerDi2015NewLine   //  to cursor and then divides by the texture's length.Di2015NewLine  //  See how Y is set to 1, which means texture height will not be changed.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SpriteEffects.None,  // this can mirror the texture, we don't do this nowDi2015NewLine  0f);                // everybody leaves this zero :pDi2015NewLine
14298963Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic float GetAngle(Vector2 v1, Vector2 v2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector2 v = Vector2.Normalize(Vector2.Subtract(v2, v1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (float)Math.Atan2(v.Y, v.X);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14298963Di2015UniqueSeparatorspriteBatch.Draw(gradline, centerScreen, null, Color.White,Di2015NewLine  GetAngle(centerScreen, cursor_v2), Vector2.Zero, 1, SpriteEffects.None, 0f);Di2015NewLine                                      // look here ↑Di2015NewLine  // this Draw overload takes float value instead of Vector2 for scaling texturesDi2015NewLine  //   so with 1 the texture size will not be scaledDi2015NewLine

14301159Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void callbake(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // call BeginAcceptTcpClient here so that it's called everytime a connection is acceptedDi2015NewLine    TcpListener listener = (TcpListener)ar.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    listener.BeginAcceptTcpClient(new AsyncCallback(callbake), listener);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TcpClient clienter = listener.EndAcceptTcpClient(ar);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("---client connect {0}<--{1} ---", clienter.Client.LocalEndPoint, clienter.Client.RemoteEndPoint);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14301370Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class AlphaNum : IComparable<AlphaNum> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private List<string> _alphas;Di2015NewLine  private List<int> _nums;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public AlphaNum(string value) {Di2015NewLine    _alphas = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    _nums = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    bool alpha = true;Di2015NewLine    int ofs = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= value.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine      if (i == value.Length || Char.IsDigit(value[i]) == alpha) {Di2015NewLine        string s = value.Substring(ofs, i - ofs);Di2015NewLine        if (alpha) {Di2015NewLine          _alphas.Add(s);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine          _nums.Add(Int32.Parse(s));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ofs = i;Di2015NewLine        alpha = !alpha;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public int CompareTo(AlphaNum other) {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0;; i++) {Di2015NewLine      bool e = i >= _alphas.Count;Di2015NewLine      bool oe = i >= other._alphas.Count;Di2015NewLine      if (e || oe) return e && oe ? 0 : e ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine      int c = _alphas[i].CompareTo(other._alphas[i]);Di2015NewLine      if (c != 0) return c;Di2015NewLine      e = i >= _nums.Count;Di2015NewLine      oe = i >= other._nums.Count;Di2015NewLine      if (e || oe) return e && oe ? 0 : e ? -1 : 1;Di2015NewLine      c = _nums[i].CompareTo(other._nums[i]);Di2015NewLine      if (c != 0) return c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14302928Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int[] input = new[] { 6, 1, 4, 3, 0, 3, 6, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLine            int[] expectedOutput = new[] { 1, 3, 3, 4, 5 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int[] solution = TryGetSolution(input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Input: " + FormatNumbers(input));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Expected Output: " + FormatNumbers(expectedOutput));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Output: " + FormatNumbers(solution));Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static string FormatNumbers(int[] numbers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Join(", ", numbers);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int[] TryGetSolution(int[] input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return TryWithoutAnyItem(input);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int[] TryWithoutAnyItem(int[] items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Range(0, items.Length)Di2015NewLine                             .Select(i => TryWithoutItem(items, i))Di2015NewLine                             .Where(solution => solution != null)Di2015NewLine                             .OrderByDescending(solution => solution.Length)Di2015NewLine                             .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static int[] TryWithoutItem(int[] items, int withoutIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsSorted(items)) return items;Di2015NewLine            var removed = items.Take(withoutIndex).Concat(items.Skip(withoutIndex + 1));Di2015NewLine            return TryWithoutAnyItem(removed.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static bool IsSorted(IEnumerable<int> items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return items.Zip(items.Skip(1), (a, b) => a.CompareTo(b)).All(c => c <= 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14304467Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<IEnumerable<int>> FooSplit(IEnumerable<int> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var groups = items.GroupBy(i => i).Select(g => g.ToList()).ToList();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (groups.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       yield return groups.Select( g => Di2015NewLine             { var i = g[0]; g.RemoveAt(g.Count - 1); return i; });Di2015NewLine       groups.RemoveAll(g => g.Count == 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14309959Di2015UniqueSeparatorUIntEnum enum = UIntEnum.Two | UIntEnum.Six;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (enum.ContainsSix())Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Enum contains Six!");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (UInt32 value in enum.GetComponents())Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Enum contains " + value.ToString() + "!");Di2015NewLine
14310276Di2015UniqueSeparatorSaveAsPng
14310276Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TextureExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void TextureToPng(this Texture2D texture, int width, int height, ImageFormat imageFormat, string filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte blue;Di2015NewLine            IntPtr safePtr;Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bitmapData;Di2015NewLine            Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height);Di2015NewLine            byte[] textureData = new byte[4 * width * height];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            texture.GetData<byte>(textureData);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < textureData.Length; i += 4)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                blue = textureData[i];Di2015NewLine                textureData[i] = textureData[i + 2];Di2015NewLine                textureData[i + 2] = blue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            bitmapData = bitmap.LockBits(rect, ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine            safePtr = bitmapData.Scan0;Di2015NewLine            Marshal.Copy(textureData, 0, safePtr, textureData.Length);Di2015NewLine            bitmap.UnlockBits(bitmapData);Di2015NewLine            bitmap.Save(filename, imageFormat);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14317933Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar s = "Hello , how are  you?";Di2015NewLinevar pattern = @"\\s+";Di2015NewLinevar regex = new Regex(pattern, RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLinevar replaced = regex.Replace(s, " ");Di2015NewLine
14317933Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafe
14317933Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic unsafe string TrimInternal(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var length = input.Length;Di2015NewLine    var array = stackalloc char[length];Di2015NewLine    fixed (char* fix = input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ptr = fix;Di2015NewLine        var counter = 0;Di2015NewLine        var lastWasSpace = false;Di2015NewLine        while (*ptr != '\\x0')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Current char is a space?Di2015NewLine            var isSpace = *ptr == ' ';Di2015NewLine            //If it's a space but the last one wasn'tDi2015NewLine            //Or if it's not a spaceDi2015NewLine            if (isSpace && !lastWasSpace || !isSpace)Di2015NewLine                //Write into the result arrayDi2015NewLine                array[counter++] = *ptr;Di2015NewLine            //The last character (before the next loop) was a spaceDi2015NewLine            lastWasSpace = isSpace;Di2015NewLine            //Increase the pointerDi2015NewLine            ptr++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new string(array, 0, counter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14318602Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Split]Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    @ItemList NVARCHAR(MAX), Di2015NewLine    @delimiter CHAR(1)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineRETURNS @IDTable TABLE (Item VARCHAR(50))  Di2015NewLineAS      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBEGIN    Di2015NewLine    DECLARE @tempItemList NVARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLine    SET @tempItemList = @ItemListDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @i INT    Di2015NewLine    DECLARE @Item NVARCHAR(4000)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @tempItemList = REPLACE (@tempItemList, ' ', '')Di2015NewLine    SET @i = CHARINDEX(@delimiter, @tempItemList)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WHILE (LEN(@tempItemList) > 0)Di2015NewLine    BEGINDi2015NewLine        IF @i = 0Di2015NewLine            SET @Item = @tempItemListDi2015NewLine        ELSEDi2015NewLine            SET @Item = LEFT(@tempItemList, @i - 1)Di2015NewLine        INSERT INTO @IDTable(Item) VALUES(@Item)Di2015NewLine        IF @i = 0Di2015NewLine            SET @tempItemList = ''Di2015NewLine        ELSEDi2015NewLine            SET @tempItemList = RIGHT(@tempItemList, LEN(@tempItemList) - @i)Di2015NewLine        SET @i = CHARINDEX(@delimiter, @tempItemList)Di2015NewLine    END Di2015NewLine    RETURNDi2015NewLineEND  Di2015NewLine

14320977Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<string> BinaryToStrings(byte[] data, int maxStringLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new char[maxStringLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream(data))Di2015NewLine    using (StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(stream, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int count = reader.Read(buffer, 0, maxStringLength);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return new string(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14321516Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string removeRtfObjects(string rtf)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //removing {\\pict or {\\object groupsDi2015NewLine    string pattern = "\\\\{\\\\\\\\pict|\\\\{\\\\\\\\object";Di2015NewLine    Match m = Regex.Match(rtf, pattern);Di2015NewLine    while (m.Success) {Di2015NewLine        int count = 1;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = m.Index + 2; i <= rtf.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine            //start groupDi2015NewLine            if (rtf(i) == '{') {Di2015NewLine                count += 1;Di2015NewLine            //end groupDi2015NewLine            } else if (rtf(i) == '}') {Di2015NewLine                count -= 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //found end of pict/object groupDi2015NewLine            if (count == 0) {Di2015NewLine                rtf = rtf.Remove(m.Index, i - m.Index + 1);Di2015NewLine                break; // TODO: might not be correct. Was : Exit ForDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        m = Regex.Match(rtf, pattern);Di2015NewLine        //go againDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return rtf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14323388Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ConfigurationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine            public void Run()Di2015NewLine            {       Di2015NewLine                // First we must get a reference to a schedulerDi2015NewLine                ISchedulerFactory sf = new StdSchedulerFactory();Di2015NewLine                IScheduler sched = sf.GetScheduler();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // computer a time that is on the next round hourDi2015NewLine                DateTimeOffset runTime = DateBuilder.EvenHourDate(DateTimeOffset.UtcNow);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // define the job and tie it to our DBJob classDi2015NewLine                IJobDetail job = JobBuilder.Create<DBJob>()Di2015NewLine                    .WithIdentity("job1", "group1")Di2015NewLine                    .Build();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Trigger the job to run on the next round hour and repeat every 24hDi2015NewLine                ITrigger trigger = TriggerBuilder.Create()Di2015NewLine                    .WithIdentity("trigger1", "group1")Di2015NewLine                    .StartAt(runTime)               Di2015NewLine                    .WithSimpleSchedule(x=> x.WithIntervalInHours(24).RepeatForever())Di2015NewLine                    .Build();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Tell quartz to schedule the job using our triggerDi2015NewLine                sched.ScheduleJob(job, trigger);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Start up the scheduler (nothing can actually run until the Di2015NewLine                // scheduler has been started)Di2015NewLine                sched.Start();          Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14325797Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic List<Intuit.Ipp.Data.Qbo.Invoice> GetQboUnpaidInvoices(DataServices dataServices, int startPage, int resultsPerPage,  IdType CustomerId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder requestXML = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder responseXML = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var requestBody = String.Format("PageNum={0}&ResultsPerPage={1}&Filter=OpenBalance :GreaterThan: 0.00 :AND: CustomerId :EQUALS: {2}", startPage, resultsPerPage, CustomerId.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest httpWebRequest = WebRequest.Create(dataServices.ServiceContext.BaseUrl + "invoices/v2/" + dataServices.ServiceContext.RealmId) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine    httpWebRequest.Headers.Add("Authorization", GetDevDefinedOAuthHeader(httpWebRequest, requestBody));Di2015NewLine    requestXML.Append(requestBody);Di2015NewLine    UTF8Encoding encoding = new UTF8Encoding();Di2015NewLine    byte[] content = encoding.GetBytes(requestXML.ToString());Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = httpWebRequest.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(content, 0, content.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    HttpWebResponse httpWebResponse = httpWebRequest.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine    using (Stream data = httpWebResponse.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Intuit.Ipp.Data.Qbo.SearchResults searchResults = (Intuit.Ipp.Data.Qbo.SearchResults)dataServices.ServiceContext.Serializer.Deserialize<Intuit.Ipp.Data.Qbo.SearchResults>(new StreamReader(data).ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine        return ((Intuit.Ipp.Data.Qbo.Invoices)searchResults.CdmCollections).Invoice.ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected string GetDevDefinedOAuthHeader(HttpWebRequest webRequest, string requestBody)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    OAuthConsumerContext consumerContext = new OAuthConsumerContextDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConsumerKey = consumerKey,Di2015NewLine        ConsumerSecret = consumerSecret,Di2015NewLine        SignatureMethod = SignatureMethod.HmacSha1,Di2015NewLine        UseHeaderForOAuthParameters = trueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    consumerContext.UseHeaderForOAuthParameters = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //URIs not used - we already have Oauth tokensDi2015NewLine    OAuthSession oSession = new OAuthSession(consumerContext, "https://www.example.com",Di2015NewLine                            "https://www.example.com",Di2015NewLine                            "https://www.example.com");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    oSession.AccessToken = new TokenBaseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Token = accessToken,Di2015NewLine        ConsumerKey = consumerKey,Di2015NewLine        TokenSecret = accessTokenSecretDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IConsumerRequest consumerRequest = oSession.Request();Di2015NewLine    consumerRequest = ConsumerRequestExtensions.ForMethod(consumerRequest, webRequest.Method);Di2015NewLine    consumerRequest = ConsumerRequestExtensions.ForUri(consumerRequest, webRequest.RequestUri);Di2015NewLine    if (webRequest.Headers.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConsumerRequestExtensions.AlterContext(consumerRequest, context => context.Headers = webRequest.Headers);Di2015NewLine        if (webRequest.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.ContentType] == "application/x-www-form-urlencoded")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, string> formParameters = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string formParameter in requestBody.Split('&'))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                formParameters.Add(formParameter.Split('=')[0], formParameter.Split('=')[1]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            consumerRequest = consumerRequest.WithFormParameters(formParameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    consumerRequest = consumerRequest.SignWithToken();Di2015NewLine    return consumerRequest.Context.GenerateOAuthParametersForHeader();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

'b':Di2015NewLine                                        sum += 11;Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    case 'c':Di2015NewLine                                        sum += 12;Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    case 'd':Di2015NewLine                                        sum += 13;Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    case 'e':Di2015NewLine                                        sum += 14;Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                    case 'f':Di2015NewLine                                        sum += 15;Di2015NewLine                                        break;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (sum > 0)Di2015NewLine                                builder.Append((Char)sum);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    serial = builder.ToString().Trim();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(bufferIn);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(bufferOut);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return serial;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static String RetrieveMACAddress()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String address = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        UInt32 size = 0;Di2015NewLine        Int32 result = GetAdaptersInfo(IntPtr.Zero, ref size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((result == 0) || (result == 111))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr buffer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal((IntPtr)size);Di2015NewLine            result = GetAdaptersInfo(buffer, ref size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (result == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    String adapterName = Marshal.PtrToStringAnsi((IntPtr)(buffer.ToInt32() + 8));Di2015NewLine                    IntPtr handle = CreateFile(String.Format("\\\\\\\\.\\\\{0}", adapterName), (eFileAccess.GenericRead | eFileAccess.GenericWrite), (EFileShare.Read | EFileShare.Write), IntPtr.Zero, eCreationDisposition.OpenExisting, 0, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (handle != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        IntPtr bufferIn = GCHandle.Alloc(0x1010101, GCHandleType.Pinned).AddrOfPinnedObject();Di2015NewLine                        IntPtr bufferOut = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(6);Di2015NewLine                        UInt32 bytesReturned = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (DeviceIoControl(handle, 0x170002, bufferIn, 4, bufferOut, 6, out bytesReturned, IntPtr.Zero))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                String temporaryAddress = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                for (Int32 i = 0; i < 6; ++i)Di2015NewLine                                    temporaryAddress += Marshal.ReadByte(bufferOut, i).ToString("X2") + ((i == 5) ? "" : ":");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                if (temporaryAddress != "00:00:00:00:00:00")Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    address = temporaryAddress;Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        finallyDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (!CloseHandle(handle))Di2015NewLine                                Console.WriteLine("WARNING: a file handle has not been correctly closed.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(bufferOut);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Int32 nextAdapterOffset = Marshal.ReadInt32(buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (nextAdapterOffset != 0)Di2015NewLine                        buffer = (IntPtr)nextAdapterOffset;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return address;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static String RetrieveSMBiosData()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String data = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (RegistryKey key = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey(@"System\\CurrentControlSet\\Services\\MSSMBios\\Data", false))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (key != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Byte[] keyData = (Byte[])key.GetValue("SMBiosData");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (keyData != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (MD5CryptoServiceProvider provider = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider())Di2015NewLine                        keyData = provider.ComputeHash(keyData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (Int32 i = 0; i < keyData.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine                        data += keyData[i].ToString("X2");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return data;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static String CreateFingerprint()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    String serial = RetrieveDiskSerial();Di2015NewLine    String address = RetrieveMACAddress();Di2015NewLine    String data = RetrieveSMBiosData();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ((serial.Length == 0) && (address.Length == 0) && (data.Length == 0))Di2015NewLine        return "0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000-0000";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String fingerprint = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MD5CryptoServiceProvider provider = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Byte[] hash = provider.ComputeHash(Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(serial + " - " + address + " - " + data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (Int32 i = 0; i < 16; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fingerprint += hash[i].ToString("X2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (((i & 1) != 0) && (i != 15))Di2015NewLine                fingerprint += "-";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return fingerprint;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region Nesting: EnumeratorsDi2015NewLinepublic enum eCreationDisposition : 14332426Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic readonly char[] TABLE = {Di2015NewLine    'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'i', 'j', 'k', 'l', 'm', 'n', 'o', 'p',Di2015NewLine    'q', 'r', 's', 't', 'u', 'v', 'w', 'x', 'y', 'z', ']', ',', '/', '.', '~', '&',Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Make a lookup dictionary of char => index in the table, for speed.Di2015NewLinestatic readonly Dictionary<char, int> s_lookup = TABLE.ToDictionary(Di2015NewLine            c => c,                          // Key is the char itself.Di2015NewLine            c => Array.IndexOf(TABLE, c));   // Value is the index of that char.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The test input string. 14335533Di2015UniqueSeparatorHexToBytesJase
14335533Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static byte[] HexToBytesJase(string hexString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((hexString.Length & 1) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Input must have even number of characters");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        byte[] ret = new byte[hexString.Length/2];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ret.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int high = hexString[i*2];Di2015NewLine            int low = hexString[i*2+1];Di2015NewLine            high = (high & 0xf) + ((high & 0x40) >> 6) * 9;Di2015NewLine            low = (low & 0xf) + ((low & 0x40) >> 6) * 9;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ret[i] = (byte)((high << 4) | low);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14335591Di2015UniqueSeparator[StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLinepublic struct BITMAPV5HEADERDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public uint bV5Size;Di2015NewLine  public int bV5Width;Di2015NewLine  public int bV5Height;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5Planes;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5BitCount;Di2015NewLine  public uint bV5Compression;Di2015NewLine  public uint bV5SizeImage;Di2015NewLine  public int bV5XPelsPerMeter;Di2015NewLine  public int bV5YPelsPerMeter;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5ClrUsed;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5ClrImportant;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5RedMask;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5GreenMask;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5BlueMask;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5AlphaMask;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5CSType;Di2015NewLine  public IntPtr bV5Endpoints;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5GammaRed;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5GammaGreen;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5GammaBlue;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5Intent;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5ProfileData;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5ProfileSize;Di2015NewLine  public UInt16 bV5Reserved;Di2015NewLine}        Di2015NewLinepublic static Bitmap CF_DIBV5ToBitmap(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    GCHandle handle = GCHandle.Alloc(data, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine    var bmi = (BITMAPV5HEADER)Marshal.PtrToStructure(handle.AddrOfPinnedObject(), typeof(BITMAPV5HEADER));Di2015NewLine    Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap((int)bmi.bV5Width, (int)bmi.bV5Height, -Di2015NewLine                               (int)(bmi.bV5SizeImage / bmi.bV5Height), PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb,Di2015NewLine                               new IntPtr(handle.AddrOfPinnedObject().ToInt32()Di2015NewLine                               + bmi.bV5Size + (bmi.bV5Height - 1) Di2015NewLine                               * (int)(bmi.bV5SizeImage / bmi.bV5Height)));Di2015NewLine    handle.Free();Di2015NewLine    return bitmap;Di2015NewLine}   Di2015NewLine

14338848Di2015UniqueSeparatorarr[index]
14338848Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource ElementAt<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return list[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (index < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentOutOfRange("index");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    TSource current;Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                return current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            index--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentOutOfRange("index");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return current;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14339318Di2015UniqueSeparator<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>Di2015NewLine<xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform">Di2015NewLine  <xsl:output indent="no" omit-xml-declaration="yes" method="text" encoding="UTF-8" media-type="text/x-json" />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<xsl:variable name="smallcase" select="'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'" />Di2015NewLine<xsl:variable name="uppercase" select="'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'" />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Main template for escaping strings; used by above template and for object-properties Di2015NewLine       Responsibilities: placed quotes around string, and chain up to next filter, escape-bs-string -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template name="escape-string">Di2015NewLine        <xsl:param name="s"/>Di2015NewLine        <xsl:text>"</xsl:text>Di2015NewLine        <xsl:call-template name="escape-bs-string">Di2015NewLine            <xsl:with-param name="s" select="$s"/>Di2015NewLine        </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine        <xsl:text>"</xsl:text>Di2015NewLine    </xsl:template>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Escape the backslash (\\) before everything else. -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template name="escape-bs-string">Di2015NewLine        <xsl:param name="s"/>Di2015NewLine        <xsl:choose>Di2015NewLine            <xsl:when test="contains($s,'\\')">Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="escape-quot-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="concat(substring-before($s,'\\'),'\\\\')"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="escape-bs-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="substring-after($s,'\\')"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine            </xsl:when>Di2015NewLine            <xsl:otherwise>Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="escape-quot-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="$s"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine            </xsl:otherwise>Di2015NewLine        </xsl:choose>Di2015NewLine    </xsl:template>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Escape the double quote ("). -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template name="escape-quot-string">Di2015NewLine        <xsl:param name="s"/>Di2015NewLine        <xsl:choose>Di2015NewLine            <xsl:when test="contains($s,'"')">Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="encode-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="concat(substring-before($s,'"'),'\\"')"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="escape-quot-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="substring-after($s,'"')"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine            </xsl:when>Di2015NewLine            <xsl:otherwise>Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="encode-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="$s"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine            </xsl:otherwise>Di2015NewLine        </xsl:choose>Di2015NewLine    </xsl:template>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Replace tab, line feed and/or carriage return by its matching escape code. Can't escape backslashDi2015NewLine       or double quote here, because they don't replace characters (␀ becomes \\t), but they prefix Di2015NewLine       characters (\\ becomes \\\\). Besides, backslash should be seperate anyway, because it should be Di2015NewLine       processed first. This function can't do that. -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template name="encode-string">Di2015NewLine        <xsl:param name="s"/>Di2015NewLine        <xsl:choose>Di2015NewLine            <!-- tab -->Di2015NewLine            <xsl:when test="contains($s,'	')">Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="encode-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" select="concat(substring-before($s,'	'),'\\t',substring-after($s,'	'))"/>Di2015NewLine                </xsl:call-template>Di2015NewLine            </xsl:when>Di2015NewLine            <!-- line feed -->Di2015NewLine            <xsl:when test="contains($s,'Di2015NewLine')">Di2015NewLine                <xsl:call-template name="encode-string">Di2015NewLine                    <xsl:with-param name="s" 14347730Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Boolean IsProtected(String file)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Byte[] bytes = File.ReadAllBytes(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String prefix = Encoding.Default.GetString(bytes.Take(2).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Zip and not password protected.Di2015NewLine    if (prefix == "PK")Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Office format.Di2015NewLine    if (prefix == "??")Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // XLS 2003Di2015NewLine        if (bytes.Skip(0x208).Take(1).ToArray()[0] == 0xFE)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // XLS 2005Di2015NewLine        if (bytes.Skip(0x214).Take(1).ToArray()[0] == 0x2F)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // DOC 2005Di2015NewLine        if (bytes.Skip(0x20B).Take(1).ToArray()[0] == 0x13)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // GuessingDi2015NewLine        if (bytes.Length < 2000)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // DOC/XLS 2007+Di2015NewLine        String start = Encoding.Default.GetString(bytes.Take(2000).ToArray()).Replace("\\0", " ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (start.Contains("E n c r y p t e d P a c k a g e"))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Unknown format.Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14349690Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void StartListen(int port)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        socketClosed = false;Di2015NewLine        IPEndPoint ipLocal = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        listenSocket = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork,Di2015NewLine            SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //bind to local IP Address...Di2015NewLine        //if ip address is allready being used write to logDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            listenSocket.Bind(ipLocal);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception excpt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Deal with this.. write your own log code here ?Di2015NewLine            socketClosed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //start listening...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        listenSocket.Listen(100); // Max 100 connections for my appDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create the call back for any client connections...Di2015NewLine        listenSocket.BeginAccept(new AsyncCallback(OnClientConnection), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14349690Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void OnClientConnection(IAsyncResult asyn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (socketClosed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Socket clientSocket = listenSocket.EndAccept(asyn);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ConnectedClient connectedClient = new ConnectedClient(clientSocket, this, _ServerTerminalReceiveMode);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //connectedClient.MessageReceived += OnMessageReceived;Di2015NewLine            connectedClient.Disconnected += OnDisconnection;Di2015NewLine            connectedClient.dbMessageReceived += OndbMessageReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            connectedClient.ccSocketFaulted += ccSocketFaulted;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            connectedClient.StartListening();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            long key = clientSocket.Handle.ToInt64();Di2015NewLine            if (DictConnectedClients.ContainsKey(connectedClient.SocketHandleInt64))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Already here - use your own error reporting..Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lock (DictConnectedClients)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DictConnectedClients[key] = connectedClient;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // create the call back for any client connections...Di2015NewLine            listenSocket.BeginAccept(new AsyncCallback(OnClientConnection), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ObjectDisposedException excpt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Your own code here..Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception excpt)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Your own code here...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14355472Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic element read(XmlReader xml)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    element elem = new element();Di2015NewLine    while (xml.Read())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        elem.ElemName = xml.Name;Di2015NewLine        if (xml.HasAttributes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i <= xml.AttributeCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                xml.MoveToNextAttribute();Di2015NewLine                attribute attrib = new attribute();Di2015NewLine                attrib.AttName = xml.Name;Di2015NewLine                attrib.AttValue = xml.Value;Di2015NewLine                elem.Attributes.Add(attrib);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (xml.IsEmptyElement)Di2015NewLine        {   Di2015NewLine            return elem;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            elem.subElems = new List<element>(); //create new List of subelementsDi2015NewLine            elem.subElems.Add(read(xml)); Di2015NewLine            return elem;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return elem;Di2015NewLine
