14356533Di2015UniqueSeparatorSolver.recursiveSolve
14356533Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void RecursiveSolve(int goal, int currentSum,Di2015NewLine        List<int> included, List<int> segments, int startIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < segments.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int nextValue = segments[index];Di2015NewLine            if (currentSum + nextValue == goal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<int> newResult = new List<int>(included);Di2015NewLine                newResult.Add(nextValue);Di2015NewLine                mResults.Add(newResult);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (currentSum + nextValue < goal)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<int> nextIncluded = new List<int>(included);Di2015NewLine                nextIncluded.Add(nextValue);Di2015NewLine                RecursiveSolve(goal, currentSum + nextValue,Di2015NewLine                    nextIncluded, segments, startIndex++);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ZeroNormAndSDComparer : IComparer<List<int>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int l0_norm(List<int> v)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int norm = 0;Di2015NewLine        HashSet<int> seen = new HashSet<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < v.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!seen.Contains(v[i]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                norm++;Di2015NewLine                seen.Add(v[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return norm;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static double StandardDeviation(List<int> v)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double M = 0.0;Di2015NewLine        double S = 0.0;Di2015NewLine        int k = 1;Di2015NewLine        foreach (double value in v)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double tmpM = M;Di2015NewLine            M += (value - tmpM) / k;Di2015NewLine            S += (value - tmpM) * (value - M);Di2015NewLine            k++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Math.Sqrt(S / (k - 1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(List<int> x, List<int> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int normComparison = l0_norm(x).CompareTo(l0_norm(y));Di2015NewLine        if  (normComparison == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return StandardDeviation(x).CompareTo(StandardDeviation(y));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return normComparison;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14356533Di2015UniqueSeparator        List<int> nums = new List<int>() { 8, 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22, 24 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int width = 80;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Total width: " + width);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Solver solver = new Solver();Di2015NewLine        List<List<int>> res = solver.Solve(width, nums.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("total :" + res.Count);Di2015NewLine        var res1 = res.Distinct(new SequenceComparer<List<int>, int>()).ToList();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("total res1:" + res1.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var res2 = res1.Where(l => l.Count == 4).ToList();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("total res2:" + res2.Count); //reduce to 4 integer solutionsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        res2.Sort(new ZeroNormAndSDComparer());Di2015NewLine

14361273Di2015UniqueSeparatorPanel

14361273Di2015UniqueSeparatorMouseClick
14361273Di2015UniqueSeparatorcontrol_MouseClick
14361273Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid control_MouseClick(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //get mouse point relative to panelDi2015NewLine    var mousePoint = panelMain.PointToClient(Cursor.Position);Di2015NewLine    int startX = mousePoint.X;Di2015NewLine    int startY = mousePoint.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //store the best match as we find themDi2015NewLine    ClickControl selected = null;Di2015NewLine    double? closestDistance = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //loop all controls to find the best matchDi2015NewLine    foreach (Control c in panelMain.Controls)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ClickControl control = c as ClickControl;Di2015NewLine        if (control != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //calculate the center point of the control relative to the parent panelDi2015NewLine            int endX = control.Location.X + (control.Width / 2);Di2015NewLine            int endY = control.Location.Y + (control.Height / 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //calculate the distance between the center point and the mouse pointDi2015NewLine            double distance = Math.Sqrt(Math.Pow(endX - startX, 2) + Math.Pow(endY - startY, 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //if this one is closer then we store this as our best match and look for the next best matchDi2015NewLine            if (closestDistance == null || closestDistance > distance)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                selected = control;Di2015NewLine                closestDistance = distance;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //`selected` is now the correct controlDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14361584Di2015UniqueSeparator[SecuritySafeCritical]Di2015NewLinepublic byte[] CryptDeriveKey(string algname, string alghashname, int keySize, byte[] rgbIV)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (keySize < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new CryptographicException(Environment.GetResourceString("Cryptography_InvalidKeySize"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int algidHash = X509Utils.NameOrOidToAlgId(alghashname, OidGroup.HashAlgorithm);Di2015NewLine    if (algidHash == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new CryptographicException(Environment.GetResourceString("Cryptography_PasswordDerivedBytes_InvalidAlgorithm"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int algid = X509Utils.NameOrOidToAlgId(algname, OidGroup.AllGroups);Di2015NewLine    if (algid == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new CryptographicException(Environment.GetResourceString("Cryptography_PasswordDerivedBytes_InvalidAlgorithm"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (rgbIV == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new CryptographicException(Environment.GetResourceString("Cryptography_PasswordDerivedBytes_InvalidIV"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    byte[] o = null;Di2015NewLine    DeriveKey(this.ProvHandle, algid, algidHash, this._password, this._password.Length, keySize << 0x10, rgbIV, rgbIV.Length, JitHelpers.GetObjectHandleOnStack<byte[]>(ref o));Di2015NewLine    return o;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14361584Di2015UniqueSeparatorNameOrOidToAlgId
14361584Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static int NameOrOidToAlgId(string oid, OidGroup oidGroup)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (oid == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return 0x8004;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string str = CryptoConfig.MapNameToOID(oid, oidGroup);Di2015NewLine    if (str == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        str = oid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int algIdFromOid = GetAlgIdFromOid(str, oidGroup);Di2015NewLine    switch (algIdFromOid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 0:Di2015NewLine        case -1:Di2015NewLine            throw new CryptographicException(Environment.GetResourceString("Cryptography_InvalidOID"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return algIdFromOid;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14361732Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TypeChainDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private List<Type> types;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TypeChain(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        types = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine        types.Add(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // searching for common base class (either concrete or abstract)Di2015NewLine    public TypeChain FindBaseClassWith(Type typeRight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.types.Add(typeRight);Di2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type Resolve()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // do something to analyze all of the typesDi2015NewLine        if (types.All (t => t == null))Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            types = types.Where (t => t != null).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var temp = types.First();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var type in types.Skip(1))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            temp = temp.FindBaseClassWithHelper(type);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return temp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14361732Di2015UniqueSeparatorFindBaseClassWith
14361732Di2015UniqueSeparator// searching for common base class (either concrete or abstract)Di2015NewLinepublic static Type FindBaseClassWithHelper(this Type typeLeft, Type typeRight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if(typeLeft == null || typeRight == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return typeLeftDi2015NewLine            .GetClassHierarchy()Di2015NewLine            .Intersect(typeRight.GetClassHierarchy())Di2015NewLine            .FirstOrDefault(type => !type.IsInterface);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// searching for common base class (either concrete or abstract)Di2015NewLinepublic static TypeChain FindBaseClassWith(this Type typeLeft, Type typeRight)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new TypeChain(typeLeft).FindBaseClassWith(typeRight);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14365873Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void AddAnimation(Button button)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var expandTimer = new System.Windows.Forms.Timer();Di2015NewLine    var contractTimer = new System.Windows.Forms.Timer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    expandTimer.Interval = 10;//can adjust to determine the refresh rateDi2015NewLine    contractTimer.Interval = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime animationStarted = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //TODO update as appropriate or make it a parameterDi2015NewLine    TimeSpan animationDuration = TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(250);Di2015NewLine    int initialWidth = 75;Di2015NewLine    int endWidth = 130;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    button.MouseHover += (_, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        contractTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLine        expandTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine        animationStarted = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        button.BackColor = Color.DimGray;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    button.MouseLeave += (_, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        expandTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLine        contractTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine        animationStarted = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        button.BackColor = Color.Red;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    expandTimer.Tick += (_, args) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double percentComplete = (DateTime.Now - 14374756Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap GetDesktopImage(int X, int Y, int width, int height)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap printscreen = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IntPtr hWnd = WIN32_API.GetDesktopWindow();Di2015NewLine    IntPtr hDC = WIN32_API.GetDC(hWnd);Di2015NewLine    if (hDC != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        IntPtr hMemDC = WIN32_API.CreateCompatibleDC(hDC);Di2015NewLine        if (hMemDC != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IntPtr m_HBitmap = WIN32_API.CreateCompatibleBitmap(hDC, width, height);Di2015NewLine            if (m_HBitmap != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IntPtr hOld = (IntPtr)WIN32_API.SelectObject(hMemDC, m_HBitmap);Di2015NewLine                WIN32_API.BitBlt(hMemDC, 0, 0, width, height, hDC, X, Y, WIN32_API.SRCCOPY | WIN32_API.CAPTURE_BLT);Di2015NewLine                WIN32_API.SelectObject(hMemDC, hOld);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                printscreen = System.Drawing.Image.FromHbitmap(m_HBitmap);Di2015NewLine                WIN32_API.DeleteObject(m_HBitmap);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WIN32_API.DeleteDC(hMemDC);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WIN32_API.ReleaseDC(hWnd, hDC);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return printscreen;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

DateTime sd = StartDate;Di2015NewLine    DateTime ed = EndDate;Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan st = StartTime;Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan et = EndTime;Di2015NewLine    List<Metrics> parsedFileData = new   {Di2015NewLine            var line = streamReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(IsLineNeedToBeParsed(line))Di2015NewLine                parsedFileData.Add(ParseLine(line));Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return parsedFileData;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsInDateRange(string line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var dateVal = GetDateTime(line);Di2015NewLine    return dateVal >= new DateTime(sd.Year, sd.Month, sd.Day, st.Hours, st.Minutes, st.Seconds)Di2015NewLine         & dateVal <= new DateTime(ed.Year, ed.Month, ed.Day, et.Hours, et.Minutes, et.Seconds);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Metrics ParseLine(string line)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var log = line.Split(',');Di2015NewLine    var time = _utility.GetTime(log[(int)timeIndex], timeformatType);Di2015NewLine    var dateVal = 14376695Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT `type`  AS 'ReturnType', Di2015NewLine       Count(*)   AS 'QAd', Di2015NewLine       (SELECT Count(*) Di2015NewLine        FROM   bartran Di2015NewLine        WHERE  qasample = '2' Di2015NewLine               AND qaerrorid = '1' Di2015NewLine               AND `type` = returntype Di2015NewLine               AND timefiledate BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2012-12-31') AS Di2015NewLine       'Correct', Di2015NewLine       (SELECT Count(*) Di2015NewLine        FROM   bartran Di2015NewLine        WHERE  qasample = '2' Di2015NewLine               AND qaerrorid = '1' Di2015NewLine               AND `type` = returntype Di2015NewLine               AND timefiledate BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2012-12-31') / Count(* Di2015NewLine       ) * 100 AS 'Accuracy' Di2015NewLineFROM   bartran Di2015NewLineWHERE  qasample = '2' Di2015NewLine       AND timefiledate BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2012-12-31' Di2015NewLineGROUP  BY type; Di2015NewLine
14376695Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT `type` AS 'ReturnType', Di2015NewLine       Count(*)  AS 'QAd', Di2015NewLine       Count(CASE Di2015NewLine               WHEN qaerrorid = '1' THEN 1 Di2015NewLine               ELSE NULL Di2015NewLine             end)  AS 'Correct', Di2015NewLine       Count(CASE Di2015NewLine               WHEN qaerrorid = '1' THEN 1 Di2015NewLine               ELSE NULL Di2015NewLine             end) / Count(*) * 100 AS 'Accuracy' Di2015NewLineFROM   bartran Di2015NewLineWHERE  qasample = '2' Di2015NewLine       AND timefiledate BETWEEN '2012-01-01' AND '2012-12-31' Di2015NewLineGROUP  BY type;Di2015NewLine

14380760Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void RunSqlCommandText(string connectionString, string commandText) {Di2015NewLine        SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand comm = conn.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            comm.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLine            comm.CommandText = commandText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            comm.Connection = conn;Di2015NewLine            conn.Open();Di2015NewLine            comm.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine        } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.EventLog el = new System.Diagnostics.EventLog();Di2015NewLine            el.Source = "data access class";Di2015NewLine            el.WriteEntry(ex.Message + ex.StackTrace + " SQL '" + commandText + "'");Di2015NewLine        } finally {Di2015NewLine            conn.Close();Di2015NewLine            comm.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int RunSqlAndReturnId(string connectionString, string commandText) {Di2015NewLine        SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand comm = conn.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine        int id = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            comm.CommandType = CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLine            comm.CommandText = commandText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            comm.Connection = conn;Di2015NewLine            conn.Open();Di2015NewLine            var returnvalue = comm.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine            if (returnvalue != null) {Di2015NewLine                id = (int)returnvalue; 14383568Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> SearchString(string textDi2015NewLine    , string firstString, string secondString, int unknown)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int lastIndexFound = text.IndexOf(firstString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (lastIndexFound >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (secondStringNearFirst(text, firstString, secondString, lastIndexFound))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return lastIndexFound.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static bool secondStringNearFirst(string textDi2015NewLine    , string firstString, string secondString, int lastIndexFound)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14383610Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<TO, TP> BuildSafeAccessor<TO, TP>(Expression<Func<TO, TP>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var properties = GetProperties(propertyExpression.Body);Di2015NewLine    var parameter = propertyExpression.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine    var nullExpression = Expression.Constant(default(TP), typeof(TP));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var lambdaBody = BuildSafeAccessorExpression(parameter, properties, nullExpression);Di2015NewLine    var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<TO, TP>>(lambdaBody, parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Expression BuildSafeAccessorExpression(Expression init, IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> properties, Expression nullExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!properties.Any())Di2015NewLine        return init;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var propertyAccess = Expression.Property(init, properties.First());Di2015NewLine    var nextStep = BuildSafeAccessorExpression(propertyAccess, properties.Skip(1), nullExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Expression.Condition(Di2015NewLine        Expression.ReferenceEqual(init, Expression.Constant(null)), nullExpression, nextStep);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> GetProperties(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var results = new List<PropertyInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (expression is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var memberExpression = (MemberExpression)expression;Di2015NewLine        results.Add((PropertyInfo)memberExpression.Member);Di2015NewLine        expression = memberExpression.Expression;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!(expression is ParameterExpression))Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    results.Reverse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return results;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14384449Di2015UniqueSeparator// Luminance vector for linear RGBDi2015NewLineconst float rwgt = 0.3086f;Di2015NewLineconst float gwgt = 0.6094f;Di2015NewLineconst float bwgt = 0.0820f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ImageAttributes imageAttributes = new ImageAttributes();Di2015NewLineprivate ColorMatrix colorMatrix = new ColorMatrix();Di2015NewLineprivate float saturation = 1.0f;Di2015NewLineprivate float brightness = 1.0f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected override void OnPaint(object sender, PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    base.OnPaint(sender, e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    e.Graphics.DrawImage(_bitmap, BitmapRect, BitmapRect.X, BitmapRect.Y, BitmapRect.Width, BitmapRect.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, imageAttributes);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void saturationTrackBar_ValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    saturation = 1f - (saturationTrackBar.Value / 100f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float baseSat = 1.0f - saturation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colorMatrix[0, 0] = baseSat * rwgt + saturation;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[0, 1] = baseSat * rwgt;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[0, 2] = baseSat * rwgt;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[1, 0] = baseSat * gwgt;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[1, 1] = baseSat * gwgt + saturation;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[1, 2] = baseSat * gwgt;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[2, 0] = baseSat * bwgt;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[2, 1] = baseSat * bwgt;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[2, 2] = baseSat * bwgt + saturation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    imageAttributes.SetColorMatrix(colorMatrix, ColorMatrixFlag.Default, ColorAdjustType.Bitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Invalidate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void brightnessTrackBar_ValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    brightness = 1f + (brightnessTrackBar.Value / 100f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float adjustedBrightness = brightness - 1f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    colorMatrix[4, 0] = adjustedBrightness;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[4, 1] = adjustedBrightness;Di2015NewLine    colorMatrix[4, 2] = adjustedBrightness;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    imageAttributes.SetColorMatrix(colorMatrix, ColorMatrixFlag.Default, ColorAdjustType.Bitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Invalidate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14384830Di2015UniqueSeparatorJsonConverter
14384830Di2015UniqueSeparator// intermediate class that can be serialized by JSON.netDi2015NewLine// and contains the same data as FooCollectionDi2015NewLineclass FooCollectionSurrogateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // the collection of foo elementsDi2015NewLine    public List<Foo> Collection { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    // the properties of FooCollection to serializeDi2015NewLine    public string Bar { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FooCollectionConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return objectType == typeof(FooCollection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(Di2015NewLine        JsonReader reader, Type objectType, Di2015NewLine        object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // N.B. null handling is missingDi2015NewLine        var surrogate = serializer.Deserialize<FooCollectionSurrogate>(reader);Di2015NewLine        var fooElements = surrogate.Collection;Di2015NewLine        var fooColl = new FooCollection { Bar = surrogate.Bar };Di2015NewLine        foreach (var el in fooElements)Di2015NewLine            fooColl.Add(el);Di2015NewLine        return fooColl;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, Di2015NewLine                                   JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // N.B. null handling is missingDi2015NewLine        var fooColl = (FooCollection)value;Di2015NewLine        // create the surrogate and serialize it instead Di2015NewLine        // of the collection itselfDi2015NewLine        var surrogate = new FooCollectionSurrogate() Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Collection = fooColl.ToList(), Di2015NewLine            Bar = fooColl.Bar Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        serializer.Serialize(writer, surrogate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14385685Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main( string[] args )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string l_input =Di2015NewLine        "I want to preserve<?start_foo \\n" + Di2015NewLine        "                    bar=\\"value\\" ?> the content\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "<?start_baz qux=\\"value\\" ?>Name\\n" +Di2015NewLine        "<?end-baz_qux ?>that is not between weird tags.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string[] l_singleTags = { "foo" };Di2015NewLine    string[] l_multiTags = { "baz" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Removing the single tags is easy:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach ( var l_singleTag in l_singleTags )Di2015NewLine        l_input = Regex.Replace( l_input, @"<\\?start_" + Regex.Escape( l_singleTag ) + @"\\b.*?\\?>", "", RegexOptions.Singleline );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Removing the multi tags is not too bad:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach ( var l_multiTag in l_multiTags )Di2015NewLine        l_input = Regex.Replace( l_input, @"<\\?start_" + Regex.Escape( l_multiTag ) + @" (?<param>\\w+).*?\\?>.*?<\\?end-" + Regex.Escape( l_multiTag ) + @"_\\k<param>.*?\\?>", "", RegexOptions.Singleline );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine( l_input );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey( true );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

StreamWriter(stream))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                requestWriter.Write(content);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine            catch (AggregateException ae)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (Exception e in ae.InnerExceptions)Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return response;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14390272Di2015UniqueSeparator    [HttpPost]Di2015NewLine    [AllowAnonymous]Di2015NewLine    [ValidateAntiForgeryToken]Di2015NewLine    public ActionResult Register(RegisterModel model)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ModelState.IsValid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Insert a new user into the databaseDi2015NewLine            using (UsersContext db = new UsersContext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                UserProfile email = db.UserProfiles.FirstOrDefault(u => u.Email.ToLower() == model.Email.ToLower());Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Check if email already existsDi2015NewLine                    if (email == null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        WebSecurity.CreateUserAndAccount(model.UserName, model.Password, new { Email = model.Email });Di2015NewLine                        WebSecurity.Login(model.UserName, model.Password);Di2015NewLine                        return RedirectToAction("Index", "Home");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ModelState.AddModelError("Email", "Email address already exists. Please enter a different email address.");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (MembershipCreateUserException e)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ModelState.AddModelError("", ErrorCodeToString(e.StatusCode));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If we got this far, something failed, redisplay formDi2015NewLine        return View(model);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Increment(pointer, -value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IntPtr Decrement(this IntPtr pointer, Int64 value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Increment(pointer, -value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IntPtr Decrement(this IntPtr pointer, IntPtr value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (IntPtr.Size)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case sizeof(Int32):Di2015NewLine                return (new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt32() - value.ToInt32()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return (new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt64() - value.ToInt64()));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IntPtr Increment(this IntPtr pointer, Int32 value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uncheckedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (IntPtr.Size)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case sizeof(Int32):Di2015NewLine                    return (new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt32() + value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return (new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt64() + value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public {Di2015NewLine                case sizeof(Int32):Di2015NewLine                    return (new IntPtr((Int32)(pointer.ToInt32() + value)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return (new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt64() + value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IntPtr Increment(this IntPtr pointer, IntPtr value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uncheckedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (IntPtr.Size)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case sizeof(Int32):Di2015NewLine                    return new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt32() + value.ToInt32());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    return new IntPtr(pointer.ToInt64() + value.ToInt64());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Methods: ComparisonDi2015NewLine    public static Int32 CompareTo(this IntPtr left, Int32 right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return left.CompareTo((UInt32)right);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Int32 CompareTo(this IntPtr left, IntPtr right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (left.ToUInt64() > right.ToUInt64())Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (left.ToUInt64() < right.ToUInt64())Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Int32 CompareTo(this IntPtr left, UInt32 right)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (left.ToUInt64() > right)Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (left.ToUInt64() < right)Di2015NewLine            return -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Methods: ConversionDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static UInt32 ToUInt32(this IntPtr pointer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (UInt32)((void*)pointer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static UInt64 ToUInt64(this IntPtr pointer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (UInt64)((void*)pointer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Methods: EqualityDi2015NewLine    public static Boolean Equals(this IntPtr pointer, Int32 value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (pointer.ToInt32() == value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Boolean Equals(this IntPtr pointer, Int64 14393012Di2015UniqueSeparator// Assume the Tuples are <height, width>Di2015NewLinestring DrawRectangles(params Tuple<int, int>[] measurements)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    var maxHeight = measurements.Max(measurement => measurement.Item1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var h = maxHeight; h > 0; h--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var measurement in measurements)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If you're on the top or bottom row of a rectangle...Di2015NewLine            if (h == 0 || measurement.Item1 == h)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(String.Format("{0}{1}{0}", "+", new String('-', measurement.Item2 - 2)));Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If you're in the middle of a rectangle...Di2015NewLine            if (measurement.Item1 > h)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(String.Format("{0}{1}{0}", "+", new String(' ', measurement.Item2 - 2)));Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sb.Append(new String(' ', measurement.Item2));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append(Environment.NewLine);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14400365Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void MyTextBlock_SizeChanged(object sender, SizeChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double desiredHeight = 80; // Here you'll write the height you want the text to useDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (this.MyTextBlock.ActualHeight > desiredHeight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // You want to know, how many times bigger the actual height is, than what you want to have.Di2015NewLine        // The reason for Math.Sqrt() is explained below in the text.Di2015NewLine        double fontsizeMultiplier = Math.Sqrt(desiredHeight / this.MyTextBlock.ActualHeight);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Math.Floor() can be omitted in the next line if you don't want a very tall and narrow TextBox.Di2015NewLine        this.MyTextBlock.FontSize = Math.Floor(this.MyTextBlock.FontSize * fontsizeMultiplier);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.MyTextBlock.Height = desiredHeight; // ActualHeight will be changed if the text is too big, after the text was resized, but in the end you want the box to be as big as the desiredHeight.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14402865Di2015UniqueSeparatorUnwrap
14402865Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task<T> Unwrap<T>(this Task<Task<T>> task)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        t.Result.ContinueWith(innerT => tcs.SetResult(innerT.Result)Di2015NewLine            , TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine        t.Result.ContinueWith(innerT => tcs.SetCanceled()Di2015NewLine            , TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled);Di2015NewLine        t.Result.ContinueWith(innerT => tcs.SetException(innerT.Exception.InnerExceptions)Di2015NewLine            , TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine        , TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion);Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith(t => tcs.SetCanceled()Di2015NewLine        , TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled);Di2015NewLine    task.ContinueWith(t => tcs.SetException(t.Exception.InnerExceptions)Di2015NewLine        , TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14403318Di2015UniqueSeparator       public object AfterReceiveRequest(ref System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message request, System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel channel, System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext instanceContext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (request.Properties.ContainsKey("UriTemplateMatchResults") && HttpContext.Current != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //get match for current requestDi2015NewLine        UriTemplateMatch match = (UriTemplateMatch)request.Properties["UriTemplateMatchResults"];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Utils.ODataBasicUriParser uriParser = new Utils.ODataBasicUriParser(match.RequestUri.PathAndQuery);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //verify if this is a SecondaryKey requestDi2015NewLine        if (uriParser.IsEntityQuery && uriParser.IsSecondaryKeyQuery)Di2015NewLine        {               Di2015NewLine            //TODO this syntax is also used for entities with multiple pk's, test itDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get a new data contextDi2015NewLine            //TODO see if this can be improved, avoid two datacontext for one request Di2015NewLine            DataContext ctx = new DataContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Type outType;Di2015NewLine            //get entity type name from the service name Di2015NewLine            string entityName = DataContext.GetEntityNameByServiceName(uriParser.EntityServiceName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get the pk for the entityDi2015NewLine            string id = ctx.GetEntityId(entityName, uriParser.EntityKey, uriParser.EntityId, out outType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //verify if the pk has been found or cancel this to continue with standart request processDi2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(id))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Trace.TraceWarning(string.Format("Key property not found for the the entity:{0}, with secondaryKeyName:{1} and secondaryKeyValue:{2}",Di2015NewLine                    entityName, uriParser.EntityKey, uriParser.EntityId));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return System.Net.HttpStatusCode.NotFound;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //in odata syntax quotes are required for string values, nothing for numbersDi2015NewLine            string quote = outType.FullName == typeof(Int32).FullName || outType.FullName == typeof(Int64).FullName ? string.Empty : "'";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //build the new standart resource uri with the primary keyDi2015NewLine            var newUri = new Uri(string.Format("{0}/{1}({2}{3}{2})", match.BaseUri.ToString(), uriParser.EntityServiceName, quote, id));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //create a new match to replace in the current request, with the new UriDi2015NewLine            UriTemplateMatch newMatch = NewMatch(match, newUri); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set request valuesDi2015NewLine            request.Properties["UriTemplateMatchResults"] = newMatch;Di2015NewLine            request.Headers.To = newUri;Di2015NewLine            request.Properties.Via = newUri;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUriTemplateMatch NewMatch(UriTemplateMatch match, Uri newUri)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    UriTemplateMatch newMatch = new UriTemplateMatch();Di2015NewLine    newMatch.RequestUri = newUri;Di2015NewLine    newMatch.Data = match.Data;Di2015NewLine    newMatch.BaseUri = match.BaseUri;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newMatch;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14403421Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class YourDataClass {Di2015NewLine        public string RequestDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string NotifDate { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        .Di2015NewLine        .Di2015NewLine        .Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Sorter<T> where T : YourDataClass {Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<string, Func<T, T, int>> actions =Di2015NewLine            new Dictionary<string, Func<T, T, int>> {Di2015NewLine                {"reqDate", (x, y) => String.Compare(x.RequestDate, y.RequestDate)},Di2015NewLine                {"notifDate", (x, y) => String.Compare(x.NotifDate, y.NotifDate)}Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<T> Sort(IEnumerable<T> list, string howTo) {Di2015NewLine            var items = list.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            Array.Sort(items, (x, y) => actions[howTo](x, y));Di2015NewLine            return items;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Sample() {Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<YourDataClass>();Di2015NewLine        var sorter = new Sorter<YourDataClass>();Di2015NewLine        var sortedItems = sorter.Sort(list, "reqDate");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14405620Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static XName Get(string expandedName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expandedName == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("expandedName");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (expandedName.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Res.GetString("Argument_InvalidExpandedName",Di2015NewLine            new object[] { expandedName }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (expandedName[0] != '{')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return XNamespace.None.GetName(expandedName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int num = expandedName.LastIndexOf('}');Di2015NewLine    if ((num <= 1) || (num == (expandedName.Length - 1)))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(Res.GetString("Argument_InvalidExpandedName",Di2015NewLine            new object[] { expandedName }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return XNamespace.Get(expandedName, 1, num - 1).GetName(expandedName, num + 1,Di2015NewLine        (expandedName.Length - num) - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14407908Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegex regexObj = new Regex(Di2015NewLine    @"\\(              # Match an opening parenthesis.Di2015NewLine      (?>             # Then either match (possessively):Di2015NewLine       [^()]+         #  any characters except parenthesesDi2015NewLine      |               # orDi2015NewLine       \\( (?<Depth>)  #  an opening paren (and increase the parens counter)Di2015NewLine      |               # orDi2015NewLine       \\) (?<-Depth>) #  a closing paren (and decrease the parens counter).Di2015NewLine      )*              # Repeat as needed.Di2015NewLine     (?(Depth)(?!))   # Assert that the parens counter is at zero.Di2015NewLine     \\)               # Then match a closing parenthesis.",Di2015NewLine    RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLine

14419923Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Int32 16To32(UInt16 color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Int32 red = (Int32)(((color >> 0xA) & 0x1F) * 8.225806f);Di2015NewLine        Int32 green = (Int32)(((color >> 0x5) & 0x1F) * 8.225806f);Di2015NewLine        Int32 blue = (Int32)((color & 0x1F) * 8.225806f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (red < 0)Di2015NewLine            red = 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (red > 0xFF)Di2015NewLine            red = 0xFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (green < 0)Di2015NewLine            green = 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (green > 0xFF)Di2015NewLine            green = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (blue < 0)Di2015NewLine            blue = 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (blue > 0xFF)Di2015NewLine            blue = 0xFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ((red << 0x10) | (green << 0x8) | blue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static UInt16 32To16(Int32 color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Int32 red = ((((color >> 0x10) & 0xFF) * 0x1F) + 0x7F) / 0xFF;Di2015NewLine        Int32 green = ((((color >> 0x8) & 0xFF) * 0x1F) + 0x7F) / 0xFF;Di2015NewLine        Int32 blue = (((color & 0xFF) * 0x1F) + 0x7F) / 0xFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (UInt16)(0x8000 | (red << 0xA) | (green << 0x5) | blue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14419923Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static Int32 Grayscale(Int32 color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Single red = ((color >> 0xA) & 0x1F) * 8.225806f;Di2015NewLine        Single green = ((color >> 0x5) & 0x1F) * 8.225806f;Di2015NewLine        Single blue = (color & 0x1F) * 8.225806f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Int32 grayscale = (Int32)(((red * 0.299f) + (green * 0.587f) + (blue * 0.114f)) * 0.1215686f);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (grayscale < 0)Di2015NewLine            grayscale = 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (grayscale > 0x1F)Di2015NewLine            grayscale = 0x1F;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return grayscale;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14421465Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<byte[]> ObservableRead(Stream stream, int bufferSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Observable.Create<byte[]>(o =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine        var read = 0;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                read = stream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                if (read == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                var results = buffer.Take(read).ToArray();Di2015NewLine                //Always return a copyDi2015NewLine                //never the buffer for concurrency's sake.Di2015NewLine                o.OnNext(results);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            o.OnError(ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            o.OnCompleted();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Disposable.Empty;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14424083Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetOutline(int indentLevel, XElement element)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetGroupOutline(indentLevel, new[] {element});Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns the outline of the elements that constitute a group.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="indentLevel">Indent level.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="elements">Elements of a group (all the element of the collection must have the same <c>Name</c>)</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Outline of the group.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static string GetGroupOutline(int indentLevel, IEnumerable<XElement> elements)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Adds the group name in the outlineDi2015NewLine    result = result.AppendLine(new string('-', indentLevel * 6) + elements.First().Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var childGroup in from element in elements  // Gets each element in the group "elements"Di2015NewLine                               from childElement in element.Elements()  // Gets their childrenDi2015NewLine                               group childElement by childElement.Name into childGroup  // Groups the children of all elements by their name to a new group called "childGroup"Di2015NewLine                               select childGroup)Di2015NewLine        result.Append(GetGroupOutline(indentLevel + 1, childGroup));  // Shows the outline of the group called "groupChild"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14429720Di2015UniqueSeparatorMapper<T>

14429720Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExpTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public class Mapping<T>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public Mapping(string fieldname, SqlParameter sqlParameter, Action<T, SqlParameter> assigner)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FieldName = fieldname;Di2015NewLine                SqlParameter = sqlParameter;Di2015NewLine                SqlParameterAssignment = assigner;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            public string FieldName { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine            public SqlParameter SqlParameter { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine            public Action<T, SqlParameter> SqlParameterAssignment { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class Mapper<T>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public IEnumerable<Mapping<T>> GetMappingElements()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var reflectionProperty in typeof(T).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Input parameters to the created assignment actionDi2015NewLine                    var accessor = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "input");Di2015NewLine                    var sqlParmAccessor = Expression.Parameter(typeof(SqlParameter), "sqlParm");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Access the property (compiled later, but use reflection to locate property)Di2015NewLine                    var property = Expression.Property(accessor, reflectionProperty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Cast the property to ensure it is assignable to SqlProperty.Value Di2015NewLine                    // Should contain branching for DBNull.Value when property == nullDi2015NewLine                    var castPropertyToObject = Expression.Convert(property, typeof(object));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // The sql parameterDi2015NewLine                    var sqlParm = new SqlParameter(reflectionProperty.Name, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // input parameter for assignment actionDi2015NewLine                    var sqlValueProp = Expression.Property(sqlParmAccessor, "Value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Expression assigning the retrieved property from input object Di2015NewLine                    // to the sql parameters 'Value' propertyDi2015NewLine                    var dbnull = Expression.Constant(DBNull.Value);Di2015NewLine                    var coalesce = Expression.Coalesce(castPropertyToObject, dbnull);Di2015NewLine                    var assign = Expression.Assign(sqlValueProp, coalesce);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Compile into action (removes reflection and makes real CLR object)Di2015NewLine                    var assigner = Expression.Lambda<Action<T, SqlParameter>>(assign, accessor, sqlParmAccessor).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    yield returnDi2015NewLine                        new Mapping<T>(reflectionProperty.Name, // Table nameDi2015NewLine                            sqlParm, // The constructed sql parameterDi2015NewLine                            assigner); // The action assigning from the input <T> Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sqlStuff = (new Mapper<Data>().GetMappingElements()).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sqlFieldsList = string.Join(", ", sqlStuff.Select(x => x.FieldName));Di2015NewLine            var sqlValuesList = string.Join(", ", sqlStuff.Select(x => '@' + x.SqlParameter.ParameterName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sqlStmt = string.Format("INSERT INTO test ({0}) VALUES ({1})", sqlFieldsList, sqlValuesList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var dataObjects = Enumerable.Range(1, 100).Select(id => new Data { Foo = 1.0 / id, ID = id, Title = null });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (SqlConnection cnn = new SqlConnection(@"server=.\\sqlexpress;database=test;integrated security=SSPI"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cnn.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(sqlStmt, cnn);Di2015NewLine                cmd.Parameters.AddRange(sqlStuff.Select(x => x.SqlParameter).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dataObjects.ToList()Di2015NewLine                    .ForEach(dto =>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            sqlStuff.ForEach(x => x.SqlParameterAssignment(dto, x.SqlParameter));Di2015NewLine                            cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                        });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Done in: " + sw.Elapsed);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DataDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Title { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public double Foo { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14432785Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System; Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel; Di2015NewLineusing System.Text; Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms; Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace CustomControls Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    public enum PasteRejectReasons Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        Unknown = 0, Di2015NewLine        NoData, Di2015NewLine        InvalidCharacter, Di2015NewLine        Accepted Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class DecimalTextBox : TextBox Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        public const int WM_PASTE = 0x0302; Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<KeyRejectedEventArgs> KeyRejected; Di2015NewLine        public event EventHandler<PasteEventArgs> PasteRejected; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool _DecimalSeparator = false; Di2015NewLine        private int _Precision; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public new HorizontalAlignment TextAlign Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            get { return base.TextAlign; } Di2015NewLine            set { base.TextAlign = value; } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Precision Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            get { return _Precision; } Di2015NewLine            set { _Precision = value; } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public DecimalTextBox() Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            TextAlign = HorizontalAlignment.Right; Di2015NewLine            Precision = 3; Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnGotFocus(EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            SelectAll(); Di2015NewLine            base.OnGotFocus(e); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnKeyDown(KeyEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            bool validate = true; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Text.Contains(".") || Text.Contains(",")) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                int indexSep; Di2015NewLine                string[] split; Di2015NewLine                string partiDecimal = ""; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Text.Contains(".")) Di2015NewLine                    indexSep = Text.IndexOf('.'); Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                    indexSep = Text.IndexOf(','); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                split = Text.Split(new char[] { ',', '.' }); Di2015NewLine                partiDecimal += split[1]; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (partiDecimal.Length >= Precision) Di2015NewLine                    if (SelectionStart > Text.Length - (partiDecimal.Length + 1)) Di2015NewLine                        validate = false; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool result = true; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool validateKeys = (e.KeyCode == Keys.Enter); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool numericKeys = ( Di2015NewLine                ((e.KeyCode >= Keys.D0 && e.KeyCode <= Keys.D9) || Di2015NewLine                (e.KeyCode >= Keys.NumPad0 && e.KeyCode <= Keys.NumPad9)) Di2015NewLine                && e.Modifiers != Keys.Shift Di2015NewLine                && validate); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool ctrlA = e.KeyCode == Keys.A && e.Modifiers == Keys.Control; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool editKeys = ( Di2015NewLine                (e.KeyCode == Keys.Z && e.Modifiers == Keys.Control) || Di2015NewLine                (e.KeyCode == Keys.X && e.Modifiers == Keys.Control) || Di2015NewLine                (e.KeyCode == Keys.C && e.Modifiers == Keys.Control) || Di2015NewLine                (e.KeyCode == Keys.V && e.Modifiers == Keys.Control) || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Delete || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Back); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool navigationKeys = ( Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Up || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Right || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Down || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Left || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Home || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.End); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool decimalSeparator = (( Di2015NewLine                e.KeyCode == Keys.Decimal || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyValue == 190 || Di2015NewLine                e.KeyValue == 188)&& Di2015NewLine                TextLength != 0 && Di2015NewLine                SelectionLength == 0); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (decimalSeparator)  Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (!_DecimalSeparator) Di2015NewLine                    _DecimalSeparator = true; Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                    decimalSeparator = false; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!(numericKeys || editKeys || navigationKeys || decimalSeparator || validateKeys)) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (ctrlA)Di2015NewLine                    SelectAll();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = false; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!result)Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                e.SuppressKeyPress = true; Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = true; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!ctrlA)Di2015NewLine                    OnKeyRejected(new KeyRejectedEventArgs(e.KeyCode)); Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            else Di2015NewLine                base.OnKeyDown(e); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnKeyPress(KeyPressEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            if (e.KeyChar == ';' || e.KeyChar == '?') Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (!(Text.Contains(",") || Text.Contains("."))) Di2015NewLine                    _DecimalSeparator = false; Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = true; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnTextChanged(EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            bool invalid = false; Di2015NewLine            int i = 0; Di2015NewLine            foreach (char c in Text) // Check for any non digit characters. Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                if (!(char.IsDigit(c) || c == ',' || c == '.')) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    invalid = true; Di2015NewLine                    break; Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (c == ',' || c == '.') Di2015NewLine                    i++; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (i == 0) Di2015NewLine                _DecimalSeparator = false; Di2015NewLine            else if (i > 1) Di2015NewLine                invalid = true; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (invalid) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                Text = ""; Di2015NewLine                return; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Text.Contains(".") || Text.Contains(",")) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                string charSep = ""; Di2015NewLine                string[] split; Di2015NewLine                string partiEntier = ""; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (Text.Contains(".")) Di2015NewLine                    charSep = "."; Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                    charSep = ","; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                split = Text.Split(new char[] { ',', '.' }); Di2015NewLine                partiEntier += split[0]; Di2015NewLine                if (partiEntier == "") Di2015NewLine                    Text = "0" + charSep + split[1]; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            base.OnTextChanged(e); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void WndProc(ref Message m) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == WM_PASTE) Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                PasteEventArgs e = CheckPasteValid(); Di2015NewLine                if (e.RejectReason != PasteRejectReasons.Accepted) Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    m.Result = IntPtr.Zero; Di2015NewLine                    OnPasteRejected(e); Di2015NewLine                    return; Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            base.WndProc(ref m); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private PasteEventArgs CheckPasteValid() Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            PasteRejectReasons rejectReason = PasteRejectReasons.Accepted; Di2015NewLine            string originalText = Text; Di2015NewLine            string clipboardText = string.Empty; Di2015NewLine            string textResult = string.Empty; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            try Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                clipboardText = Clipboard.GetText(TextDataFormat.Text); Di2015NewLine                if (clipboardText.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    textResult = ( Di2015NewLine                        Text.Remove(SelectionStart, SelectionLength).Insert(SelectionStart, clipboardText)); Di2015NewLine                    foreach (char c in clipboardText)Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        if (!char.IsDigit(c)) Di2015NewLine                        { Di2015NewLine                            rejectReason = PasteRejectReasons.InvalidCharacter; Di2015NewLine                            break; Di2015NewLine                        } Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLine                else Di2015NewLine                    rejectReason = PasteRejectReasons.NoData; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            catch Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                rejectReason = PasteRejectReasons.Unknown; Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine            return new PasteEventArgs(originalText, clipboardText, textResult, rejectReason); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected virtual void OnKeyRejected(KeyRejectedEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            EventHandler<KeyRejectedEventArgs> handler = KeyRejected; Di2015NewLine            if (handler != null) Di2015NewLine                handler(this, e); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected virtual void OnPasteRejected(PasteEventArgs e) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            EventHandler<PasteEventArgs> handler = PasteRejected; Di2015NewLine            if (handler != null) Di2015NewLine                handler(this, e); Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14436932Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring SplitOnWholeWord(string toSplit, int maxLineLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    string[] parts = toSplit.Split();Di2015NewLine    string line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    foreach(string s in parts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(s.Length > 32)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string p = s;Di2015NewLine            while(p.Length > 32)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int addedChars = 32 - line.Length;Di2015NewLine                line = string.Join(" ", line, p.Substring(0, addedChars));Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine(line);Di2015NewLine                p = p.Substring(addedChars);Di2015NewLine                line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            line = p;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(line.Length + s.Length > maxLineLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine(line);Di2015NewLine                line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            line = (line.Length > 0 ? string.Join(" ", line, s) : s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sb.Append(line.Trim());Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14439658Di2015UniqueSeparatorIUnityContainer container = new UnityContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//fixedDi2015NewLine//by default RegisterType will create new instance of the type every time Di2015NewLine//the container resolves the dependancy Di2015NewLinecontainer.RegisterType<ILogger,SomeLoggerImplementation>();Di2015NewLinecontainer.RegisterType<Foo>();Di2015NewLinecontainer.RegisterType<Bar>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//will create a new instance of SomeLoggerImplementation using a default ctor, pass it to the constructor of Foo and return the instance of FooDi2015NewLine//if SomeLoggerImplementation has some other dependancies they can be registered in the container too! Di2015NewLinevar foo = container.Resolve<Foo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//will create a new instance of SomeLoggerImplementation using a default ctor, create a new instance of Bar, Di2015NewLine//Set the value of the Property Logger (but not the Logger2), and return the instance of BarDi2015NewLinevar bar = container.Resolve<Bar>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Constructor injectionDi2015NewLinepublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ILogger _logger;Di2015NewLine    public Foo(ILogger logger)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if Foo is resolved from the container , the value for the logger parameter will be provided from the containerDi2015NewLine        _logger = logger;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//property injectionDi2015NewLinepublic class BarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //If Bar is resolvced from the container the value for the Logger property will also  be provided from the containerDi2015NewLine    [Dependency]Di2015NewLine    public ILogger Logger { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this will not be injectedDi2015NewLine    public ILogger Logger2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Bar()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14440778Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<ILookup<T, U>> Pool<T, U>(T[] t, U[] u)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Start off with all zeroes.Di2015NewLine    int[] indices = new int[u.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Build a Lookup from the array.Di2015NewLine        var lookup = (Lookup<T,U>)indicesDi2015NewLine            .Select((ti, ui) => new { U = u[ui], T = t[ti] })Di2015NewLine            .ToLookup(p => p.T, p => p.U);Di2015NewLine        // Only return it if every part is non-empty.Di2015NewLine        if (lookup.Count == t.Length)Di2015NewLine            yield return lookup;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Increment to the next value.Di2015NewLine        int toIncrement = u.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        while (++indices[toIncrement] == t.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            indices[toIncrement] = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Stop when we can't increment further.Di2015NewLine            if (toIncrement-- == 0)Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14440778Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (var q in Pool(Di2015NewLine    new[] { "part1", "part2" },Di2015NewLine    new[] { 70, 100, 50, 200 }))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (int i in q["part1"])Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(i + " ");Di2015NewLine    Console.Write("| ");Di2015NewLine    foreach (var ii in q["part2"])Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(ii + " ");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14441967Di2015UniqueSeparator    Vector2 TranslationVectorFromScreen(Vector2 toTranslate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector2 output = new Vector2();Di2015NewLine        Vector2 tempOffset = offset; // copy of the main screen offset as we are going to modify thisDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        toTranslate.X -= GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Width / 2;Di2015NewLine        toTranslate.Y -= GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Height / 2;Di2015NewLine        tempOffset.X /= tileBy2;Di2015NewLine        tempOffset.Y /= tileBy4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        toTranslate.X /= tileBy2 * scale;Di2015NewLine        toTranslate.Y /= tileBy4 * scale;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        toTranslate -= tempOffset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.X = (toTranslate.X + toTranslate.Y) / 2;Di2015NewLine        output.Y = (toTranslate.X - toTranslate.Y) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output += new Vector2(-1.5f, 1.5f); // Normaliser - not too sure why this is neededDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.X = (int)output.X; // rip out the data that we might not needDi2015NewLine        output.Y = (int)output.Y; // Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14444306Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTime
14444306Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SetUserStartTimesUTC()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DateTime nowUtc = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine    TimeZoneInfo zone = TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById(UserTimeZoneID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // User-local values, all with a Kind of Unspecified.Di2015NewLine    DateTime now = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime(nowUtc, zone);Di2015NewLine    DateTime today = now.Date;Di2015NewLine    DateTime startOfThisMonth = todayUser.AddDays(1 - today.Day);Di2015NewLine    DateTime startOfNextMonth = startOfThisMonth.AddMonths(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now convert back to UTC... see note belowDi2015NewLine    UserStartOfDayUTC = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc(today, zone);Di2015NewLine    UserStartOfMonthUTC = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc(startOfThisMonth, zone);Di2015NewLine    UserEndOfMonthUTC = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeToUtc(startOfNextMonth, zone);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14444306Di2015UniqueSeparatorDateTimeZone.AtStartOfDay(LocalDate)
14444306Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SetUserStartTimesUTC()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // clock would be a dependency; you *could* use SystemClock.Instance.Now,Di2015NewLine    // but the code would be much more testable if you injected it.Di2015NewLine    Instant now = clock.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // You can choose to use TZDB or the BCL time zonesDi2015NewLine    DateTimeZone zone = zoneProvider.FindSystemTimeZoneById(UserTimeZoneID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    LocalDateTime userLocalNow = now.InZone(zone);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    LocalDate today = userLocalNow.Date;Di2015NewLine    LocalDate startOfThisMonth = today.PlusDays(1 - today.Day);Di2015NewLine    LocalDate startOfNextMonth = startOfThisMonth.PlusMonths(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    UserStartOfDayUTC = zone.AtStartOfDay(today);Di2015NewLine    UserStartOfMonthUTC = zone.AtStartOfDay(startOfThisMonth);Di2015NewLine    UserEndOfMonthUTC = zone.AtStartOfDay(startOfNextMonth);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14457662Di2015UniqueSeparatordef bubble(part, i=0): #add one to the list whilst keeping lexicographic orderDi2015NewLine    if i == (len(part)-1) or part[i] < part[i+1]:Di2015NewLine        part[i] += 1Di2015NewLine        return partDi2015NewLine    else:Di2015NewLine        return bubble(part, i+1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef partitions(n):Di2015NewLine    if n == 1:Di2015NewLine        yield [1]Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine    for p in partitions(n-1):Di2015NewLine        yield [1] + pDi2015NewLine        yield bubble(p)Di2015NewLine

14459463Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<string> SpaceDelimitedSubstrings(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<int> indices = new List<int> { -1 };Di2015NewLine    int current = -1;Di2015NewLine    while ((current = input.IndexOf(' ', current + 1)) > -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indices.Add(current);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    indices.Add(input.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int minLength = 1;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < indices.Count - minLength; i++)Di2015NewLine        for (int j = i + minLength; j < indices.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            yield return input.Substring(indices[i] + 1, indices[j] - indices[i] - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14461328Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static bool Check(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string segment in input.Split('~'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] tokens = segment.Split('*');Di2015NewLine            if (tokens[0] == "AAA")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                count++;Di2015NewLine                if (count == 3)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (tokens[3] == "63") return true;Di2015NewLine                    else return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
14461328Di2015UniqueSeparator    private bool Check(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return input.Split('~').Select(x => x.Split('*')).Any(x => x.Length >= 4 && x[0].Equals("AAA") && x[3].Equals("63"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

14467986Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void numericComboBox_KeyDown(object sender, KeyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.SuppressKeyPress = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Determine whether the keystroke is a number from the top of the keyboard.Di2015NewLine            if (e.KeyCode < Keys.D0 || e.KeyCode > Keys.D9)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Determine whether the keystroke is a number from the keypad.Di2015NewLine                if (e.KeyCode < Keys.NumPad0 || e.KeyCode > Keys.NumPad9)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Determine whether the keystroke is a backspace or arrow keyDi2015NewLine                    if ((e.KeyCode != Keys.Back) && (e.KeyCode != Keys.Up) && (e.KeyCode != Keys.Right) && (e.KeyCode != Keys.Down) && (e.KeyCode != Keys.Left))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // A non-numerical keystroke was pressed.Di2015NewLine                        // Set the flag to true and evaluate in KeyPress event.Di2015NewLine                        e.SuppressKeyPress = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Handle any exception here...Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
