14472104Di2015UniqueSeparatorpartial class TypeExtensions {Di2015NewLine    static readonly Type[] EmptyArray=new Type[] { };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static T[] Subtract<T>(this T[] ax, T[] ay) {Di2015NewLine        return Array.FindAll(ax, x => false==Array.Exists(ay, y => y.Equals(x)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static T[] Intersect<T>(this T[] ax, T[] ay) {Di2015NewLine        return Array.FindAll(ax, x => Array.Exists(ay, y => y.Equals(x)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int GetOccurrenceCount(this Type[] ax, Type ty) {Di2015NewLine        return Array.FindAll(ax, x => Array.Exists(x.GetInterfaces(), tx => tx.Equals(ty))).Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int GetOverlappedCount<T>(this T[] ax, T[] ay) {Di2015NewLine        return ay.Intersect(ax).Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Comparison<Type> CoverageComparison(this Type[] az) {Di2015NewLine        returnDi2015NewLine            (tx, ty) => {Di2015NewLine                var ay=ty.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine                var ax=tx.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine                var overlapped=az.GetOverlappedCount(ax).CompareTo(az.GetOverlappedCount(ay));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if(0!=overlapped)Di2015NewLine                    return overlapped;Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    var occurrence=az.GetOccurrenceCount(tx).CompareTo(az.GetOccurrenceCount(ty));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if(0!=occurrence)Di2015NewLine                        return occurrence;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        return 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
14472104Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static partial class TypeExtensions {Di2015NewLine    public static Type[] GetTypesArray(this Type node) {Di2015NewLine        if(null==node)Di2015NewLine            return EmptyArray;Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            var baseArray=TypeExtensions.GetTypesArray(node.BaseType);Di2015NewLine            var interfaces=null==node?EmptyArray:node.GetInterfaces().Subtract(baseArray);Di2015NewLine            var index=interfaces.Length+baseArray.Length;Di2015NewLine            var typeArray=new Type[1+index];Di2015NewLine            typeArray[index]=node;Di2015NewLine            Array.Sort(interfaces, interfaces.CoverageComparison());Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(interfaces, 0, typeArray, index-interfaces.Length, interfaces.Length);Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(baseArray, typeArray, baseArray.Length);Di2015NewLine            return typeArray;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type FindInterfaceWith(this Type type1, Type type2) {Di2015NewLine        var array=type2.GetTypesArray().Intersect(type1.GetTypesArray());Di2015NewLine        var typeCurrent=default(Type);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(var i=array.Length; i-->0; )Di2015NewLine            if((null==(typeCurrent=array[i])||null==typeCurrent.BaseType)?i>0:false) {Di2015NewLine                var typeNext=array[i-1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if(typeNext.FindInterfaceWith(typeCurrent)!=typeNext)Di2015NewLine                    return default(Type);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return typeof(object)!=typeCurrent?typeCurrent:default(Type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type FindBaseClassWith(this Type type1, Type type2) {Di2015NewLine        if(null==type1)Di2015NewLine            return type2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(null==type2)Di2015NewLine            return type1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(var currentType2=type2; null!=currentType2; currentType2=currentType2.BaseType)Di2015NewLine            for(var currentType1=type1; null!=currentType1; currentType1=currentType1.BaseType)Di2015NewLine                if(currentType2==currentType1)Di2015NewLine                    return currentType2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return default(Type);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type FindEqualTypeWith(this Type type1, Type type2) {Di2015NewLine        var baseClass=type2.FindBaseClassWith(type1);Di2015NewLine        var interfaCe=type2.FindInterfaceWith(type1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(null==interfaCe)Di2015NewLine            return baseClass;Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            if(null==baseClass||typeof(object)==baseClass||baseClass.IsAbstract)Di2015NewLine                return interfaCe;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return baseClass;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14473036Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<Flat> GetSavedOutput(List<Flat> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get all output leaf nodesDi2015NewLine    var toAdd = items.Where (i => i.isOutput == true).ToList();Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<Flat>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // grab all parent nodes that are not already included untilDi2015NewLine    // there's nothing new to addDi2015NewLine    while (toAdd.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.AddRange(toAdd);Di2015NewLine        toAdd = items.Where (i => !result.Contains(i)Di2015NewLine                               && result.Any (r => r.parentId == i.id)).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

14475146Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ExtWebClient : WebClientDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public NameValueCollection PostParam { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri address)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WebRequest tmprequest = base.GetWebRequest(address);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = tmprequest as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (request != null && PostParam != null && PostParam.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder postBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine                //build the post stringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < PostParam.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    postBuilder.AppendFormat("{0}={1}", Uri.EscapeDataString(PostParam.GetKey(i)),Di2015NewLine                                             Uri.EscapeDataString(PostParam.Get(i)));Di2015NewLine                    if (i < PostParam.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        postBuilder.Append("&");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                byte[] postBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(postBuilder.ToString());Di2015NewLine                request.ContentLength = postBytes.Length;Di2015NewLine                request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var stream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine                stream.Write(postBytes, 0, postBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                stream.Close();Di2015NewLine                stream.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tmprequest;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
